lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should just get a sound cue for that at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's expected now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like our version of (air horn).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (like an air horn) Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get started, we have some announcements to get to. First and foremost, we have two fantastic sponsors tonight: our fantastic friends from D&D Beyond return. Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm calling it My Christmas Gif. You heard that right. It's not a Christmas gift, it's a Christmas GIF.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you make the letter F with your hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: GIF.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are two Cs. Or "Jiff" if you want to say it wrong. Here's how it's going to work: I don't know how to make a GIF or a "Jiff," but you fine Critters out there do. So what I'm going to do is do some movements, some reactions, some acting, and hopefully be joined by some fellow cast members. The crew's going to bring out a green screen and we're going to do this over there at this camera. You guys will be encouraged to add your own backgrounds to make this something memorable that can live online so that when you're going through the Twitters or the Reddits or the "Im-i-gurrs", I don't know what that is, "Im-gurr"?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Imgur.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll act one out. I'm going to go over here to this camera, Matt, if you'll excuse me for one second--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're really doing this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we're making some GIFs, right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe you guys are doing this for him. Max!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's lots of GIFs to choose from. I'm going to do one. You know the guy who blinks who is like, "Hmm, that's weird?" I'm going to do that. Okay, ready? And action. (humming) Okay! Someone will make that into a GIF! Taliesin, do you want to make one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, not really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll direct you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. No. How are you doing this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, I'll hold this so you can just act.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a lot of applause GIFs out there, so why don't you do an applause or a praising type GIF? Ready? And action!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got to get your hand up here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it, didn't work. Matt, do you want to come do one? No, these are all innocent GIFs. You know how sometimes on Twitter you see a GIF where it's like this. Like, "What that commenter said, "I agree." Just do that, just point up and be like "Yeah!" Yeah! Right? Yeah! That's a GIF right there! We just made a GIF! Last but not least, I'll do one, I'll do a success one where a d20 comes rolling in and knocks me out of the frame or something, I don't know, we'll figure it out later!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about dramatic prairie dog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's a good one.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: ♫ Bum bum bum! ♫

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it! That's a wrap! Thanks, guys! (applause)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done. Good call, Travis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That worked so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and give the gift of gaming now by helping support their work and thus, support these kids as well at TheRookAndTheRaven.com/CriticalRole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice! That's so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's badass. I love that that is a thing that can happen now. I get messages from a lot of people saying they have gaming clubs at their schools and now there's too many kids playing and like-- that's so-- yay. That's such a surreal reality; I'm so happy about that. We also have some other big announcements this week that we put up. First off, we have a fantastic art show coming up soon. You guys had a chance to see the art book, the Vox Machina final campaign art book, now we get to announce that we have our very first art show to celebrate the fantastic art community that's come out of Critical Role. Each piece of art was created by community artists, curated by us. Tickets for the opening reception will be available this coming Monday, December 17th, and are completely free, and that's just for the reception. You don't need tickets for the two other days. The exhibit will be open through January 20th. You can stop over at any point in the weekend if you missed the actual reception event. It's going to be there. It's going to be at Gallery Nucleus. You can find out all the information for that at CritRole.com. We also announced that on Saturday, January 19th, that same weekend, we are doing a return to Vox Machina one-shot, our first campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so excited!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be the Search for Grog. For those, no spoilers, but towards the very end of the campaign, something happened, one of our players pulled a thing from a deck of thingy-things and briefly derailed a lot of things, and we just glossed over it. We're actually going to play through that adventure as a one-shot with all the returning members of Vox Machina but two, because Grog is being sought after and another character will not be present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Grog) I couldn't help it, I'm sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We could make it, you know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Travis, some might say that you were forward thinking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hosted by Brian Wayne Foster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Also, be sure to join us next week for our very special holiday one-shot, that is being DMed by our fantastic Liam O'Brien.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ha! Ha! Oh my gosh! I'm so excited! I've had this idea in my head for two years!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have, that's right!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two years! I wanted to do it last Christmas! I'm mostly ready. We'll see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was not expecting that much exuberance out of you. I am twice as pumped now for this, just from that. That was adorable!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be fun! It's going to be so much fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's called The Night Before Critmas. It'll air on Friday, December 21st at 7:00pm, so Friday next week, to kick off the holidays right. 7:00pm Pacific at twitch.tv/criticalrole. Last but not least, we also have our very special end of the year State of the Role tomorrow, which will give you more insight into our holiday programming schedule, a few fun things that we have coming in 2019. You can check out all the details tomorrow morning at CritRole.com and probably posted across our socials, so keep an eye out for that. I think that's it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, four pages of notes, I think you got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (no audio) (chanting) Role! Critical! Role! [dramatic Critical Role theme]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (music)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) They got magic and flair, they got falchions and cunning. They don't see over there there's a monster incoming. Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice. Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, roll the dice! (chanting) Role! Critical! Role!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Can you answer the call? Diggin' deep in your soul as the legend unfolds. Now it's your turn to roll! [fire burning]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. That was adorable, Laura. Last we left off: The Mighty Nein, after spending an exorbitant period of time at sea at the behest of Captain Avantika, on the ship the Squalleater, got pulled into piracy under the banner of The Revelry, brought to the pirate city and island of Darktow amongst the Dragshallow Reefs. There, you uncovered information, proof that she had plans to overthrow the Plank King and rule the seas, along with her fanatical obsession with Uk'otoa.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was where we left off. Mighty Nein, as you've all gathered your things, you can hear the distant crack of thunder as the storm gets smaller behind you on the horizon. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we go back down and just push the button, just make sure that we're wiped out once and for all? I'm kidding. We should make our way over to the Bisaft Isle, right? Need repairs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be the thing to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are pretty hurt here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how's everybody feeling, by the way? Are we damaged, beat up? We all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing that a good night's rest won't help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or two... three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many days will it be sailing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd estimate probably three or four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three or four days from where you are now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got it right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Believe! You hear that? Holy shit, I got it right! As I was saying. Orly, if you would, please plot us a course to the Bisaft Isle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, don't you worry." He goes ahead and sets course. The ship makes its turn across the water in the direction of the Bisaft Isle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bishaft?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bisaft.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Bishaft, ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No H, it's Bisaft!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's made of fucking cookies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bisaft.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Biscotti?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Biscotti Islands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To that degree, you guys have a few days of travel, anything you'd like to accomplish in this time? You've taken a long rest for the first evening. You're restored if you need to restore your spells and hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a small list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your small list, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, you said that we have some cannons aboard. Do we have gunpowder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I would like to fashion, if I can, three more explosive arrowheads for myself, if possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or attempt to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a tinkering check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three times?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you do that up in the crow's nest, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right in the belly of the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you proficient with the tinker's tools?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have tinker's tools. Where do I see--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can you tell if you're proficient?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's under your proficiencies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, which on D&D Beyond--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, proficiencies and languages.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scroll up... no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. But I am good with chemistry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is part of the deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Alchemist's supplies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just constructing a casing and a means of detonation. Just roll and add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three times?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Two, 11, 13! Plus four. So 17, 15, low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the crow's nest, as Fjord--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm down near the cannons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where the gunpowder is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you be anywhere else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally the first thing they teach you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one goes by easy as heck. You're proud of yourself. Second one, a little tenuous, but you manage to craft it, and that's nice. The third one, roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus zero.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, in all the excitement, and your mind's eye focusing entirely on all the wonderful explosions this is going to cause, aren't paying attention to the wire you're using to seal off where the head of the explosive bolt goes. As you pull, through a series of lucky circumstances, a spark gets hit. There's a brief moment where you hear that (hissing) and you're like "Oh!" There's just a flash. Roll a dexterity check for me-- a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's at an angle! Move your fucking thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is at an angle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still a two, though. Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus seven, but wait! Don't I have something on dexterity saves where I can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Don't I have something? I should know my shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You really should!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have evasion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's evasion? It's an area effect! So if it's a big explosion, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct! Unless your cloak gives you advantage on dexterity saving throws?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you uncanny dodge a shitty dex roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you fail, it's half damage, not full damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So you failed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello! I hear you're trying to do a rogue action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that explosion, 13 points of fire damage you suffer, halved because of your evasion trait, so that'll put us at six. You take six points of fire damage as there's this brief explosion that rocks the vicinity and your ears ring. You grab the sides of your face as your eyes attempt to focus. In that brief instant, you see a shape move through the center of the galley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a fucking stowaway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! First of all, am I singed? Did the other arrows-- Is everything safe? Is anything else going to blow up? Any other fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything seems safe!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just get them all out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb! Jester! Beau! Everybody, below decks! Find out what that was!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, everything's fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That you, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll climb up. It's okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys look up, you can see this smattering of dark soot all across her face. The hair's scattered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Nott! Are you injured?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was a booby trap set by Avantika! But I found it and disarmed it! It's all right. We're safe now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad you survived. There's a lot of gunpowder down there!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. I was just making sure that we were safe and we definitely are now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need to have any company below?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'll be okay below. But Beauregard?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Halfling, I will say to her: There's someone hiding downstairs. We need to act fast, but don't alert the others yet; they'll overreact! You and I are the calm and steady ones. We can deal with this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott! What is coming out of your mouth right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were saying our daily prayers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all have daily prayers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's called, "Get the fuck out of our business."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of heat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. I've been on a boat for a very long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just don't want us to all go down there and scare away whatever it is-- oh, no I'm still in Halfling!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're sure we shouldn't let Fjord know? Or we should just handle it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we kill them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, Fjord?! He hasn't done anything to us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, I heard your name. Whatever they're saying, I heard your name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right? You heard that; it was like: (gibberish) Fjord (gibberish).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to translate it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb starts speaking in Zemnian: What are we doing? What are you talking about? This seems rude to me! What is going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What language were you speaking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zemnian.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it, I don't know that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gather close, everyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Common: there might be someone down below, hiding. In my exploration, I might have seen a shape moving down there. I don't want us to go charging down there and blow up--!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) It's the Traveler!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shh! Not too loud!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure there are no more booby traps below?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so. This one was very specific in its design, seemed to be a one-of-a-kind thing, I hope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you go back down there? Take Beau, Jester with you, and we will stay up here to make sure they don't get by you on the way out, but you need to find whomever or whatever that was and isolate it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isolate!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Contain!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's Vera? Do you think it could be Vera?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't she die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she didn't. She was in shackles next to the ogre, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, last you saw Vera she was burned pretty bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was vague about his wording at that moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But! Isolate and contain, go now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quick footsteps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try not to do it-- well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I go down I go: Fjord. Sorry for being a dick. Then just go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apologies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an improvement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Growth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's impressive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Character arc!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said Jester, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going stay and keep an eye out on deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of you head down past the galley, or the kitchen where you originally saw the shape move. You're now towards the center where the cannons and the accessible stores of gunpowder are. You guys can see the scarring mark on the wood there where the previous explosion happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (talking through his teeth) Near the galley is where I saw the thing move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, so much better then mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then. You glance past the galley; you don't see any movement. You glance across the opposite side near where the stairway leads into the cargo hold below. You look past and you swear you see something looking back from around one of the barrels, then disappear behind it, and you hear (light footsteps).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! Hello? We saw you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way to flank around behind wherever that shape was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible. Where you saw it was right next to the stairs that lead down into the cargo hold. Whatever the shape was, it moved behind one of the large barrels there, made a run for it, hoping it wouldn't be seen, and then went downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It went downstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the cargo hold, yes.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we go downstairs. I quietly dart forward to block off the path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so blocking off the area. Everyone make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hood up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! (whispering) I bless you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Okay. What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) You get advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, that's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! Thanks for that blessing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bless you! (clattering) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that tips the scales a bit, then. You guys are quietly making your way down there, hearing the creaking of wood and the very faint, muffled sounds of waves crashing against the outside of the Squalleater. You see a shape duck down even further back in the cargo hold behind one of the box clusters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see what it looked like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too far away and there's no light down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too bad I can't make light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did he send us three?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put on my night-vision goggles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you have darkvision, as long as you have the goggles on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to go scare it out or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Me neither.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) What? You can be scary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Your duplicate!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I was going to say Thaumaturgy, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that, too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I use Thaumaturgy and I send-- I don't want to use my duplicate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just send the Thaumaturgy, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I use my duplicate! I send my duplicate where the boxes are that they are hiding behind and at the same time I use Thaumaturgy to say: (spooky voice) There are ghosts on the ship!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flank. Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (quick footsteps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good, a little Naruto run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And describe to them what they see.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sitting in the tiniest little corner, in the littlest ball, I have created an illusion of a halo over my head, so I look like a perfect little angel. It's just a tiny little gnome girl. You would have no idea how old I am. I'm really cute, and there's sticks in my hair, and I got singed a little bit, so one cheek's covered in soot. I have really pretty necklaces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I go: Ghosts? Did you say ghosts? I'm scared of ghosts!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh! There's no ghosts, you're so cute!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: There's chocolate smeared on my face as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come out! You're so cute! Is it a little child--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get down! Don't say a word!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want some candy? Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! This is not good cop, bad cop. We're supposed to contain! Contain!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: At this moment, I push my hand out, and another little hand slides off of it and comes forward. It comes into your face and goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, she's so cute! How could I do that to you? I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay! Okay. Who the fuck are you, though? Seriously?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who the fuck are you, though?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I open up my little cloak and I go: Should we tell them? Okay! I think that-- yes! No, I think they're friendly. It's okay! So I go: I'm Twiggy! (deeper voice) This is Trixie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Trixie's my bestest friend, and we got stuck on this ship. But I have lots of chocolate and lots of apples. As you can tell, that's all I've been eating! And I wonder if it's okay if I could hang out with you guys for awhile? Until we get to shore?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What were you doing hanging out on a ship in a pirate island?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hmm!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a little cutie pie!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I know! So I just needed somewhere to hide for a while, and there was this box, and it was open, and they were bringing it on a boat, so I was like: Hey sounds like a good idea!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that seems like a perfectly reasonable explanation for me.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's what I thought!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does Trixie look like?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Trixie's got a big bushy tail, and a cute little-- do you want to see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I open up my cloak and sitting in my pocket is the tiniest, cutest little squirrel you've ever seen, with the tiniest little nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Trixie would love Sprinkle! My little crimson weasel pops out from the hood on my cloak.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I let Trixie run down my arm, and they boop noses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: This is a very girly game today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I feel like we're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have this, too! It's something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so cute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're letting the cuteness distract us! Why were you hiding? Sorry, sorry. Why did you feel the need to hide? What did you do?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, I'm really nice, but I don't always make the best decisions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can relate.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so nice.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Totally. I don't know. There was this really pretty thing, and this really bad guy was going to get it. I was like, that's not fair, right? So I took it, okay. I took it. You don't care, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the pretty thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What sort of thing?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't know, you guys. It's kind of tricky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have it?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah. I look at you all. I say: I never let it leave my side. I turn around and go in my bag, and I'm digging through my bag. I'm like: It's not this, not that one. I've got all these little trinkets of things, even little drawings that I've made and stuff like that. They're little houses and clouds and stuff. I pull out this thing, and it's a sphere. It's made of all these intricate little puzzle pieces. I'm like: See, I can move it around, but I'm not quite sure what it does. But it's clearly really pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I touch it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your perspective, it would be about that big, but for her it seems even that much bigger. It's a brass and golden sphere that consists of many layers of intertwining clockwork, sliding hemispheres, rotating bands, and strange inscriptions. It's this massive, complicated mess of contraption, puzzle, sliding pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. That's cocked. Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can tell there's probably some magic involved, but it's a combination of clockwork and magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just that we're surrounded by gunpowder down here, so maybe not right now.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Don't worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you solved it? Is it a puzzle?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, but it can do this. Can I do the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I put my hand on one side, and I pull back one ring. As it pulls around across, at the same time, I click another one to the side. It slides around the side and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the last part clicks into place, there's a (whir, puff), a burst of light. About 15 gold coins go (clanging) to the ground in front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, we have gold coins. Is it real gold coins? Is it fake gold coins like you and Caleb did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You crack a tooth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't need that one. It's real!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that's the coolest thing ever. We just have this lame old dodecahedron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't show her that.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, you've got cool stuff too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I showed you my stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She showed her stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't argue with that, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I got-- ah, it's happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have this thing that, if you look really hard at it, you have a special gift. You should look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What she reveals, as she pulls out of this bright pink satchel, this colored leather satchel she has, is this dodecahedron shape that has gold trim around the edges and these handles. It looks like a gray quartz, and it has a very faint hum to it. It seems to glow in a rhythmic, heartbeat fashion. It has this very strong presence, and the air around it has its own subtle vibration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want to look at it, that's cool.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I lean over it, and my eyes are huge, twice the size of my head. Not twice the size, sorry. They take up half my head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: They take up the whole top half of my face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty freaky, too.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Like the big-eyes pictures. I'm looking into it, and my eyes are reflected back off the thing. I stare, and I let it wash over me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your peripheral blurs and darkens. Within, you feel like you're leaning into it. It's no longer an object; it's like a pool of water, and you cross the surface, and it's warm. Past that, in the darkness, you see stars, an endless sea of stars drifting towards you and past you. You look ahead, and you can see other little shapes. You look at them, and they're you. They're little ghosted versions of Twiggy. They're all going in different directions, and some of them fade, and some of them are created. Two of them join and create a new light and go in a separate path. In that moment, you see this single, glowing, warm light that appears and presents itself to you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I totally reach out and touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out and put your hand towards it, it merges with your hand. The warmth carries through your wrist and forearm.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I giggle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gives this warm, interior hug-type sensation. As you close your eyes to relish in it and open them again, you're back on the boat with them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty cool, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's much smarter than any of us down here.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I take it, and I roll it across the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Beau, get it! Get the thing! Get the ball!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put the dodecahedron back in the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As a note, you have what's called a Fragment of Possibility. For the rest of the day, anytime you have to make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, any roll with a d20, essentially, you get to reroll it. You get to roll an additional d20 and choose which of the two to take.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Just once?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One luck.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: After I've rolled it, I can choose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Twiggy. Now that you've looked at the fragment, you're bonded to us, which means if you betray us, we'll know how to find you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: So that sounds great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are all the right answers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go upstairs and show you to everyone else.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'd love to be shown. I have a dance!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. I dance behind her.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I turn around and my skirts goes flying up and everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this? This is the best day in the universe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does she still have chocolate all over her face?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, totally. As we go up to the next level, I take you to my box where I've been living for the last week. It is filled with apple cores and chocolate wrappers and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A stench of urine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: As you say that I go: Oof. I motion to a corner in the back, and I was like: I'm surprised you guys didn't notice that earlier. It's pretty bad over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my bad. I'm down here a lot. I thought it was me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real perceptive, rogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go introduce you to the others.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, but I'm a little shy. Who am I meeting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're meeting Fjord, and you're meeting Caleb, and you're meeting Caduceus, and you're meeting Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so they're all big. They're all bigs.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm little.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one of these two is taller?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, probably even keel between the two of you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nice! We should come up with a dance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've done that before.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Have you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's something like this. Then you do this.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You'll have to teach me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's a lot of wiggling of your hips, and it looks pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of them is a big cow man, but he's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got pink hair; he's really pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a stony-faced, harbinger of death-type lady.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got wings that are so magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's pretty cool, though. She's cool. She likes flowers.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I like flowers! I dig in the back of my hair into a rat's nest, and I pull out a really old, wilted, dying flower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, Yasha will love that because it's dry like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do the same. I also put flowers in my hair sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really cool.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Best friends!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, I don't want to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's fine. You guys can be best friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no! I think she meant all of us. I think she meant all of us. It's okay. You can be--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: They're really old and wilted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, around the side, Marius LePual has walked down into the center of the ship and is standing there. "Who the fuck is that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our new best friend.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Twiggy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marius, please god, save me. Marius, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're all scaring me right now. I'm going to go lay down."

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll follow them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys all make you your way back up to the deck of the Squalleater. As you hear the footsteps rising, you look back to hopefully hear information about how things went down with the supposed sound and stowaway. Instead, you see them arrive with Twiggy.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (sings a riff)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what we found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) She's so cute. This was downstairs. She's the cutest ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that mud on her face?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's chocolate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chocolate.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Mm-hmm. You want some?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is Twiggy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twiggy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Captain Tusktooth. He runs the ship.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, wow, thank you so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can call me Fjord. That's not necessary.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Captain Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Captain Fjord works.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Fjordy. Fjord and a half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is Caleb.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Fjorda people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb is very smart, and he's good with magic. He can probably determine what you're carrying, what that ball was that Beau has now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who-- what-- how-- why are you on the boat?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Just hanging out! Going for a trip, you know? Seeing the world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seemed legit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I call Caduceus over. Caduceus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That clarifies that, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We found a Twiggy.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Found a Twiggy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was hiding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From bad people. Unspecified, so far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She stole this.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I was a little bit bad, but just a little.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you did something to deserve this?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, I took it. That's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like her. She walks away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got nothing, man. I don't even know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, can I talk to you for one moment, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We walk away. Just so you know, I think she's really cool, and I don't think anything is wrong with her. I think she's the best thing in the universe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I can tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But in case you're trepidatious, because I can see on your face that maybe you are a little--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my emotion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- I do have Zone of Truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. How old is she?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Twiggy is doing spins, whirling dervish in the background.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much chocolate have you been eating? And for how long? Whoa. Oh, wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you worried that her parents are wondering where she is, or her family?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I didn't wonder about that. I wasn't worried, but I guess I should.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in the middle of the ocean, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but her parents were probably pirates if she was stowing away. (gasps) Twiggy!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been on the ship?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: This ship? About a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About a week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This ship?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Oh, sorry. Yep, took another one before. I don't know, kind of a habit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are you from?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Far, far away. I'm from far, far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Port Damali.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Port Damali.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It feels far when you're little and you've been living in a box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty far, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm actually from Port Damali.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, howdy there, neighbor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is so crazy. Are you trying to get anywhere in particular?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nope, just was trying to get away from Port Damali.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are your parents there?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nope, no parents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No parents? You're an orphan?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, they died a while ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're an orphan for a while?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How deep are these waters? I'm trying to figure out how much of this is-- obviously, a lot of this is bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bullshit? What are you talking about? She's the greatest person in the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything you want to whisper to him? Feel free to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, even just general vibe.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I've honestly been very honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, everything's been--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little omission maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am halfway through Identify on this clockwork gizmo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: dndbeyond.com/criticalrole, let them know that you came from us. Give them some love.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly think we need to feed you something that isn't chocolate.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a gnome, right?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't gnomes live for a pretty long time?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you could actually be fairly old--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Who knows!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't know how old you are.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: As you see me walk through the shadows, in shadow I could be 60 years old, but when I step out into the light it's like, seven!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fascinating. I don't think she's as young as she seems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were you by yourself, Twiggy? There's no one else we have to worry about pissing in the corner of the boat, do we?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No one that I know of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except for Trixie!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's Trixie?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's okay! Don't worry, they'll like you! They like me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are you talking to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got a rodent in her pocket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A rodent?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: This is Trixie!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is that? Goddamn chinchilla? What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a squirrel. I know that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a squirrel.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's a little squirrel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't trust squirrels; they're tree rats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Squirrels are great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're wonderful, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just keep it to yourself.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's okay. Trixie likes it in my pocket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has an octopus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes a cat, so be careful with your squirrel around his cat.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Trixie's very wily.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, can I put you in charge of keeping an eye on Twiggy? Twiggy, we're going to the Bisaft-- what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bisaft Isle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bisaft Isle. I don't know if you're familiar with that area. We need some repairs, and then hopefully you can find your way from there.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sure. Thanks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're concentrating on--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was doing a ritual casting of Identify as soon as the thing was in my hands and not talking to anybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so continue while you're doing that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's sit down. I'll show you how to draw the perfect dick.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (gasps) Perfect!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, could you make sure that she gets some real food?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just about to go get something with something that's not chocolate in it. That's probably for the best. I'll be back. Oh, boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, as you finish the ritual, your vision crystallizes on the object. As part of the Identify, the information that would transition to you fails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This blocks you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interest intensifies!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is this thing that you have? What is this called? Does it have a name?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't think it was on the card. I call it my fun ball of tricks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happy fun ball?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Happy fun ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do not solve happy fun ball.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Must solve happy fun ball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you get it from?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, did you make it? Did you get it from someone else?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, it was sitting somewhere, and I was like, this is cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a museum, or--?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. It was on a little pedestal, and people were looking at it, and it had a little card on it. Then I saw this guy, and I was like, he's a mean man, and I said--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was he the docent or something?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, he wasn't wearing a uniform or anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you think he was mean? What gave off that impression?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (whispering) I've seen him before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know him?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: He's a rascally man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's his name?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: His name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sir Cadigan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sir Cadigan? That's a good name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was this in Port Damali?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: This was in Port Damali. You are smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know of any museums or places with magical items in Port Damali?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check. Low DC, since you're relatively local.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not so much in the way of museums, per se, but there are collections. There are collectors, and those are usually private and invite-only through mutual merchants and nobles and people of affluent nature. But there are two auction houses where a lot of these items are sold and traded by these collectors. One exists in Port Damali. It's called the Exalted Collection Auction House.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Exalted Collection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to spell exalted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can copy off of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Twiggy, tell me. This happy fun ball of yours, what does it do?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, it makes money, for one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much money?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Depends where you touch it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She made 15 gold pieces down there out of nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a Frumpkin and a half.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: This is true. I've heard of these frumpkins. I'm just kidding; I don't know what that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's his cat-octopus. Owl, also owl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This does other things besides making money? What else does this do?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I've played with it a lot, and all kinds of little flashes and things go off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm coming up with a veggie plate, by the way, the sort of things you're embarrassed your parents bring up, and putting it down.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Twiggy goes: Yum! And digs right in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any future plans here? Is there something that you're moving towards? Do you have a place that you're heading, a goal, anything?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I like making friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I go around looking for friends. I give my most winningest smile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is heavily disarming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing great, then. But there's a direction, a cardinal direction that you're making these friends in, or do you--?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Things just sort of happen to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sometimes I do things, and then I end up somewhere. I go where the wind blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that a lot of the strange inscriptions on it appear to be complicated variations of basic conjuration glyphs. None that you've seen, but you can see the similar shapes, the similar equation-type connection between these glyphs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would explain the money, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a strong conjuration element all across, and very minute, impossibly small engraving across the metal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I tell how old this thing looks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty polished. There's a couple of errant smears of chocolate caught in some aspects of it, a few sticky fingerprints in some areas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chocolate and Cheetos and all sorts of shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cheeto dust sprinkles out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it holds a certain amount of coins, and you have to turn it the right way. Can you hear coins?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't hear anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's because there are so many, they don't shake around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it limitless? Does it make money all day long?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, every time I twist it in that one way, it'll make money drop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you show me the one way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much money do you have down in the box? Because that's a lot of times!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Who needs money?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, one moment. Twiggy?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you show me how you make money with it?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I take it back, and I sit down, and I cross my knees. I put it in my lap, and it's like this giant beach ball. I do this same movement where I pull it from the top around so that it opens up, and then I can use my thumb. You see my fingers are actually long and slender and perfectly suited for this. It pushes around the other side, doing the same movement I did before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, (puff), you see this flash of white light, and eight gold coins clank to the surface of the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, would you look at that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I see that one more time?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Catch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From perfect memory, I duplicate what she just did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, (puff), white flash. Four gold coins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's half every time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I take them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15, eight, four.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I pick up the eight, and I say: You want those?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Nott already took them.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The eight that came out when I did it the first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Nott already took them.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I missed it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You mind if I take a look at that really quick?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I walk it over to him. Here you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can roll it. It's all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't think that's a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to move some stuff and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, man. Awesome. Oh, no, damn, it was almost a natural one. I'm so sad. That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You find one section that shifts, following suit with her, and it sticks. Yeah, you're not getting anywhere.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh. That's really cool, though. I imagine doing that all day. That'd be great. Yeah, I can imagine doing that all day.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Welcome to my world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Rolls really well, too. I'm sorry, I don't actually even remember why I asked for it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I pick it up and do that basketball thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we going to do with this little kid and/or old lady?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think we'll take her to the island and then, obviously, give her a chance to continue her adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can stay with us forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now, Jester, look, I loved Kiri as much as the next person. So much, just, mm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Kiri's wonderful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so great. But I also don't want to be responsible for anyone that can't take care of themselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can take care of yourself. She made a hand. Can you do cool things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She made a what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was super freaky, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we forgetting to describe things that are of import on this ship? She did what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has a bit of magic.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: At this point, I walk up to you and I say-- oh, no, I walk up to you. I say: How many tickles does it take to make an octopus laugh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no, don't you dare.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Ten tickles! And I cast Hideous Laughter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's an 18.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: So it doesn't work, but I go: Funny, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not a happy guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wanted to see a Caleb laugh so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Like some horrible crash.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's an octopus joke!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (awkward, forced laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so she's not entirely invalid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's assessing his new crew. This is what a professional captain does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Jester, you would not want guilt over bringing in sweet Twiggy here to what could be certain doom. That's what we do; we seek out certain doom.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sounds fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to allay some of our fears, were people actively pursuing you and chasing you when you got onto this boat? And if so, how many?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell the truth, now.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, I always tell the truth. Mom and Dad said, very important to always tell the truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May they rest in peace.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: There were quite a few people chasing me. But I'm super fast. Not really, I'm just really sneaky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think they might still be chasing or tracking you or wanting to find you?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hadn't really thought about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. That's not great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you said you got that nice little sphere there; anything else we should know about, maybe?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Fun ball of tricks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fun ball of tricks, yes. I will not forget again. Anything else we should know about that people might wish they had instead of you?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's all I've got right now, but I do have sticky fingers. I hold them up, and they're covered in chocolate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's got the sphere?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus had it last.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: He's had it. We've been playing, and I twirled--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a twirl, and it went back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any prospects? Any long-term plans, goals? Where do you see yourself in a year, let alone a week from now?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hanging out with you guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Best answer ever!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Kiri?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Kiri?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Nott? We're all friends. What about Cali? We all love each other so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little confused at your implication as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to Detect Magic to get a--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: On me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Detect Magic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a powerful magical essence emanating from that sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. No one's got anything sitting on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A different kind of magic, but comparable to the dodecahedron in some ways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Same vibe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and there is two faint magical auras on her person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) She's holding!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Would he know? Could he be able to tell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would be able to tell if there was something magical on your person. He wouldn't know any more than that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb would know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I'm going to leave you in charge of Twiggy, all right? We've got to make for this island. You keep an eye on her. I don't want to see any chocolate thumbprints in my quarters, you understand, Twiggy?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those were all over it, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, you're in charge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, don't steal from us, okay?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good. See, we're good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As Fjord gets the boat going, I follow after Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to, seeing as how she said there are folks chasing her, as we get going again, go up to the crow's nest, and do a scan with my awesome perception, and see if there's any boats trailing us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check as you clamber up to the top of the crow's nest and glance over the horizon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking off in the horizon, you currently don't see any ships that are immediately pushing into the territory. You're following Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need help getting the boat-- ship sailing? Ship moving? Whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, of course. Feel free to lend a hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I the only one that's not beguiled by her charms? Twiggy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you're not the only one. I don't trust that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me neither. Anything that cute--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That saccharine? Yeah, you need some salt to balance that shit out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever noticed that pomeranians are the nastiest dogs you've ever met?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's a pomeranian?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll eat your face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run over to them and say: Oh, Twiggy just did this thing with her tongue where she made it into a circle. It was really great; you've got to see it later!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Not everyone can do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we throw her overboard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a solid option. Like a Plan D.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you were down there with her, did she try any shady shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She definitely has some magic capabilities. She cast this illusion that made her hand look like it was extending. I think it was supposed to be cute, but you know that uncanny valley? It was a little weird. It's unsettling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, I have another question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since you're captain now, right? You're captain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you train me to be your first mate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Yes, I will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got to, like, co-sign for the boat and shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shake on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, first mate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stings you a little bit. Your wound's still fresh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! Fucking Cobalt grip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry again for being a dick. I think I've been a little bit on edge with the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right, I'm kind of immune now. I just take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really just a knee-jerk, it would've happened if it was anybody. You could've been a scarecrow, and I would've been like, "Fuck off, bro!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel so special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also know, as you're heading into legal territory under the Clovis Concord, that you have a ship that is known and labelled as the Squalleater, as damaged as it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Change the name!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (burbling) That's my call. (burbling) Forward deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Squallbeater. The Balleater!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Balleater!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to change it to the Balleater as quickly as possible. Nott, I need you to hang over the side of the ship with a paintbrush--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to draw attention to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- inches above the water and change the name of the ship to the Balleater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It actually works pretty easily! You just add a line, and then you paint over that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you do it?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I say: Don't worry about it! Don't worry! Again, this hand comes off of my own hand. I flick it, and it flies off and it comes and picks up the paintbrush. I lean over the side, and it goes down and starts to change your title for you, without having to risk his life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. She can paint, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a dexterity check for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I never remember to use it like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is dexterity, to see how well you can paint it while upside down.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is apparently a Mary Poppins musical act.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently! Not only does she manage to entirely erase the beginning of the word "Squall," but has beautifully calligraphied the B of "Ball" to where it looks almost like a set of balls, if interpreted that way. It has this nice sparkly border around it now. It's like (singing) Balleater! It's almost got jazz hands.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Shadowed and decor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Calligraphy's very impressive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this regular paint or the magic paint?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is regular paint.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a side note, I am hiding my magic paint like whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It comes back up and it paints a mustache on me, and I go: Arr!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: On me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was on me! I was like, (yelps).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was very impressive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good. That's really, really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've made some allies today with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a temporary pirate now.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (gasping) My eyes get even bigger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a great honor; don't mess it up. What were you saying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should take the sail down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say we probably took stock of any colors we have that we can run up that aren't associated with the Squalleater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no colors on deck that aren't associated with it. The only colors that are on deck were the colors that the ship previously sailed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still have some fire damage on the boat, though? We're going to play that. Our flag was burned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our flag was burned by pirates.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could paint a new flag with your brush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but that's a really big amount of paint to use for a flag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Are you ever going to use that paint?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably pre-Calamity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the fuck out of here. What? That's so old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pre-Calamity is 800 years, and there's a whole era of very powerful magic--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it only 800? I thought it was 8,000.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, 800 years ago was the Calamity. Or a little over 800.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb, just a second? Just thought you should know there's a couple interesting magical auras on our new friend. I thought it would be impolite to point it out or to dispel anything. I try and respect people's personal intentions, but if you feel the urge to do a little Identify at some point, that may not be a bad idea. I don't know. Just to make sure that everything that's there is meant to be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Noted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not getting a bad vibe off of this one, just a lot of sugar. Being held up for a while in a dark, confined space can make people a little loopy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am also worried about traveling around-- Well, I am not a fan of the name Balleater for this boat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a similar note, I feel like our new miniature friend will also draw attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. That's a very fair point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe I'll have a chat with her, get us on the same page.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if she's necessarily going to listen to you. She's a little--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes people listen to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very true. You do have an air of authority. You do! Right now, I'm feeling really awkward about this whole conversation purely from your face. Your face has done nothing, and now I'm just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it takes two to tango. My palms are sweating at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That weirdly makes me feel better. I'll disengage straight up, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to find our little friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. I'm going to go over and cook something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to say we're up in the crow's nest? Is that a good place to be? Or would you like to be somewhere else? I know you've been below deck for a very long time.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I've climbed up on those things, and I'm swinging back and forth on the ropes and the hooks on the main mast, wind in my hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening and you're approaching, Caleb, you see Orly sitting there with his giant tortle arms looking up with his craned tortle neck, and going, "Hmm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has she been doing that for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Far too long."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in the crow's nest going: Twiggy? Twiggy, seriously, come back to the crow's nest, though!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Five more minutes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bitte, a moment of your time, just to have a chat. You can keep swinging, but could you swing a little lower?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I jump. It's really light and beautiful, almost like I couldn't fall at all. You see me grabbing on the hooks like a little monkey. I fly down the mast and jump down so I can sit right next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of that movement is making me nervous.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Don't be nervous!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (counting) That's weird!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's sort of a running gag, but it's our name.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I love gags!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, if you're going to be traveling with us for a while, I have a few suggestions.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So three. The first of them is probably when we get to land, it will be better if you kept a low profile because we sometimes cut a rough swathe wherever we go and I can't guarantee that someone is not familiar with us. So I would hate for any danger to, you know-- best not to call attention.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No more friends. Don't make any more friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, just stick with us for a little while, and see how that works out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I love that idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. The second suggestion is that you should meet my cat, Frumpkin.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I put my hand over Trixie, in my pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the matter?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Does your cat like squirrels?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, my cat is very well trained and will not hurt your squirrel. I promise.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: So is Trixie. (as Trixie) Yeah, I'm real good. (as Twiggy) Sorry. It's me saying it! It's not Trixie, it's me saying it. (as Trixie) I'm crate trained!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scarcely know what to do with you. We'll get to the cat in a minute. I will so gladly introduce you to my cat because I'm very fond of him and love for people to meet him. But before we do that, the third suggestion is-- and I cast Suggestion-- I suggest you share any strange or unique or arcane objects or things even that are of threat with me just so I know that we are safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I have advantage on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, it takes effect.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No worries. I scramble up to you and I try to sit in your lap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, how about you just sit next to me?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I lean my head on your shoulder, and I say: Okay, so I have this little pouch. Out of my bag, again there's feathers and fleece and all this sand and stuff I'm pulling out. I pull out a little cube and say: This is my achoo dust.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, put that back in your pocket.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It goes back in my pocket, and then I go: You want to see something cool?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I go and lift up my cloak and put it over my head. As I do that, another little Twiggy shows up right next to me, and when I move she moves. I go: Look! And we do a little dance for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I put one of my hands through their heads.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: One of them, yes, it's an illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, people have a real hard time getting me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not going to try to do that.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm watching from the crow's nest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every time she goes into that pouch and opens it up, you can still see taking up a large portion of it, massively, like a distended backpack, is the slightly shifting clockwork of that sphere.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I take my hood off and go: Neat, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the neatest. Do you have anything that is harmful or is it just those two things including your puzzle ball?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I say: Well, these can do some damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your hands?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are registered deadly weapons.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Don't mess with me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what it's worth, I apologize, and here's my cat. I turn Frumpkin the first night on this boat into a cat and use the last of my supplies, so it's Frumpkin the cat right now. That's Frumpkin.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is best cat.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Can I pet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course. He's already climbing up her shoulder.

lines.name: DEBORAH
