lines.text: I pet him and it's like: Ooh, I love your cat! Ooh, that tickles!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell him to do a blep. So he just does this--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And Twiggy goes-- back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Goody! I sit on the floor and Frumpkin and I start booping each other on the nose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go and sit like 20 feet away and watch to make sure everything is on the up and up.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And that's eight hours on Suggestion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, until the directed activity is completed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if she's shown me everything of arcane nature.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I've shown you all the magic stuff on my person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, so Suggestion has worn off.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most awkward on-ship high five ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Gandalf) Hello, Twiggy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your new compatriot for this journey seems to have, for the time being, accepted into your wings, is there anything else you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be showing Beau the ropes, first-manning the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're getting that situated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be finishing up some stuff in the kitchen. I'm going to run by Caleb one more time to have a chat about what he saw. Just mention, we've got two magical spheres on board. The one's like a clock thing--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One is in Fjord's gooch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking it's like a clock. Maybe that means time-- I don't know if time's passing, or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm very curious about it. I would like very much to see if she's willing to sell it or part with it somehow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or at least let you take a look at it for a while or something. Maybe, I don't know. It gives me a chill. Not sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was not paying attention. Has anyone said how long it is until we reach land?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Three days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this point, a little over three days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe she'll lend it to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to teach Twiggy all about The Traveler. He's pretty cool.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So The Traveler, she explains to you in a very truncated way, is the being that she worships but talks with and taught her a bunch of things and they've been a friend. Anything else you want--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like he would like you a lot, you know, because number one, he likes people that can be sneaky because it's fun, right? And you can be sneaky.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's the most fun ever!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, he has a cloak, just like you have a cloak. Really cool. Also, he always kept me company. I know you had a lot of time by yourself, right? So did I, and he always kept me company.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Is he like (as Trixie) Trixie?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's more like (high-pitched) The Traveler!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The Traveler!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he comes and he's over here!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, that's cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can talk to him. You could try any time. He's around, you know.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hello, Traveler! I don't hear anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, hold on! Give him a minute! Traveler, come on, I'm trying to bring somebody to you right now!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm trying! Maybe he doesn't like me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he likes you a lot, I can tell.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Don't worry. He'll make himself known to you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had mentioned briefly that some of Avantika's men and helpers had been armed with firearms. If I scout around, is there any ammo aboard this ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first time we got on the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to scavenge up two boxes of firearm ammunition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any that fit the gun that I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stole a gun a while ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, from Hupperdook, I think it was, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we were here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you might have been--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we were around for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to pull together 22 shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That fit my piece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That fit yours. There are a few others that don't quite. They're made for a larger rifle-type, but these particular iron balls will fit yours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. That's a kill shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool. Thanks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, going off of that, because I meant to do this last episode, did Avantika have anything fabulous in her wardrobe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, we were opening her closet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were opening it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. There are plenty of coats, hats, scarves, all kinds of things. Most of them in a similar vein to what you see her wearing. Most of them are long coats with the sleeves removed, a high collar. Big, billowing scarves and cravats that are varying degrees of well kept. A lot of these she's had for a long time and, as such, at sea, there's weathering. Some of them have grown damp and have a little mildew at the very edges but have been scraped off multiple times, which give it a cool look, but maybe a little bit of a musty smell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mending!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a number of interesting outfits of a dead woman that you manage to scavenge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take one of her darker overcoats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rest of the days I'm going to parade around the deck in her clothing. Different outfits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester gives us a fashion show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is dark. Even for me, this is dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is still the same day, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We can continue this journey to the second day if you want to, but it's up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hello, your hour is up, I need my cat back now.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (sighs) Give him back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Maybe another day, though, you can see him again. I'm sorry that I used arcane trickery on you. May I borrow the Happy Fun Ball for a few hours, just to play with it?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hmm, okay! I take it out of my box and I roll it to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crashing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want this to poop coins, I don't think you should do that too much.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't know, never was a problem before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've had it for a week?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy, oh boy, okay. I wander off with it to study it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I put my head on his shoulder. What you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 16. Sometimes it takes a while for my mind to settle on truths, and I'm having a hard time thinking about it right-- you know, maybe I will save this for later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 16, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this absentmindedly, you find another portion of it that previously was locked in place and wouldn't move. You manage to rotate one band and all of a sudden it comes free and turns as well. You start shifting it a bit and, as you turn, a little cylinder extends a little bit, and you press on it and you hear (poof) There's another burst, but this one has a dull blue color to the burst of light. Suddenly four cut jade pieces of stone appear and hit the ground.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Whoa, it never did that before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you just have to tinker with it a little bit. Holy cats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What! This is the best thing ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick up the jade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each one's worth about 100 gold, if you want to mark that down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Upgrade!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still learning tattoos from Orly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I know, I know, that's exactly where my mind went!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you looking to sell this, by any chance?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't like money so much. What else you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So a good trade, you're talking about.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That could work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about-- I'm going to throw out some ideas here. I'm going to start spitballing, because I'm very curious about this. I love puzzles. What about some sort of mystical tattoo?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: What would it do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Many things.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Many things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been listening to my friend, Jester, speak of them a lot. All the time.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I listen to her, too. She's got a lot of fun stories.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true. This one time, she watched an ant carrying a piece of bread six or seven times larger than it up stairs.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh my goodness. I've never seen anything like that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've never, either, but I take her word for it because she's on the up and up. Maybe you talk to Jester about a mystical tattoo. That's one thing on the table. You could be an honorary member of The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh! Well, that sounds fun. I like friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I go up, I put my arms around him and, if he'll let me, I'll kiss him on the cheek.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Instant death.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes, make a saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's my next character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kiss of death.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thank you for letting me play with your cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you get the whole day.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I chase after her, we go play, and you can play with the Fun Ball of Tricks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Danke sch�n.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another investigation check, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) That was a fun time. Good. I'm short circuited from the kiss on the cheek. Yeah, no, I know, it's not helping! 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From that place where you had it, you find one of the other grinding bands-- it felt like sandpaper when you tried to move it-- is now moving smooth, like it has no resistance, so you twist that one around and as you do, you hear this clicking sound. It fits into place. There's another piece around that you hear give this very faint (creaking) sound. You look for it and you find it, and there's a little knob. You turn the knob and as you do, another section opens up on one side, and then there's this flash and you look over on the ground, and in the middle of the wood there's a black hole about a foot wide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is definitely Pinhead stuff.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Whoa! I pick up the cat and I walk over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! Have you ever seen this before?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, this is all new to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't see through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you look and it's just black.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just black?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't see the next deck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We should jump in. Jump in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that is a very bad idea, Twiggy.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (as Trixie) I would jump in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to make that arrangement with your squirrel, you are perfectly welcome, but my cat is not going in that hole. (foomph) For the moment. Something-- Captain!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll come running down. Yeah, what is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And his first mate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to announce it when you show up. Don't yell your superiority. We'll get you a shirt or something.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I take out five ball bearings and drop them into the hole. You hear it hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you let go, they make no sound. They just disappear into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's traveling with the boat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I still seeing from the crow's nest all of this shit happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you just see Fjord and Beau go down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any lumber? There's no oars. Are there any rifles left on this boat, or anything long?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rope?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, rope, is there rope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got 100 feet of rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me borrow that. I'm flustered. I start lowering rope down in, maybe five or six feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it gets to about five or six feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I pull it back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's rope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know that it's fine. There's a hole to nowhere in the middle of the boat that came out of Happy Fun Ball. What do you call this thing?

lines.name: LAURA, DEBORAH
lines.text: Happy Fun Ball of Tricks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it creates things. It creates money, it creates gems, and it creates holes to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put your hand in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I am not going to put my hand in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm reach down and put the tip of my finger in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Temperature feels a little colder, but it goes in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just feels cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take your finger out. Is it gone now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do another one, do another one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, at the very least we need to put a plank of wood over this so that nobody falls into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (foomph) It's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it only lasts for a little bit. I wonder where it would have taken us? Was it big enough for us to go through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a person-sized hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was about a foot across, so a smaller person, maybe, but a lot of you guys it would have been a tight squeeze. Not Caduceus at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, First Mate Beauregard, I'm glad you're here. I want to introduce you to the new honorary member of The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. My goodness. You must have proved yourself greatly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome to The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Why thank you. We'll be The Mighty Ten! No? That's not how it works?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We vote on the name every couple of months, but it's going to be a while.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she needs a hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. The bigger, the better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every pirate needs a hat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want one of Avantika's hats?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Are they my size?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be really big on you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We put a hat on and it comes down to here. As I move, it slides across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll tell you what. I will use my pretty paint to paint her a really cool pirate hat that is her size. Okay. It's like this big.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And it has the points on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly what you want, yes. It has the tricorn. And do you want feathers and stuff?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: One big purple feather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it, one big purple feather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes this couple of materials out and this pot of paint. As she paints with it, it begins to take shape and become a physical object, representative of what she drew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want any sparkly stuff on it, or a bow? Sometimes bows are really pretty.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I have a feather already. Can you put a little squirrel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally. It will be a squirrel figurine on this, next to the feather. It'll be really pretty, okay. There we go. (poof)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (gasps) I take it, and I put it on, and I'm like: Now I'm a real pirate!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look like a really good pirate.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will say, what we have learned on all our travels on the ocean is, the days are long and you have to make your own fun.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh boy, you're telling me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sphere is still locked in the place where you had it last, and there's that one little knob that's still visible from where it was. It seems like, with each stage that you've unlocked of this, it's opened up another stage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's getting more pokey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Less smooth and spherical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Less smooth, and there are more elements that are starting to protrude a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does this thing, every day, sort of shrink back in on itself, or do you ever slide it back together? Or has it been getting more complex over time?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I've never gotten it further than that first stage, so I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It took me a few minutes to--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (as Trixie) Do it again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you have to do is press on that to trigger it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To press-- oh. (clicks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof) That hole appears again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same size, in a slightly different location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go in a hole?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What if the hole disappears while Nott is still in it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure it'll be fine.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll take out my lantern, and I strike it so that it's lit. I attach it to a string. I go and I start to lower it down the hole and see if it does anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the lantern hits the darkness, the darkness consumes it like water. Once the lantern is submerged within the darkness, no light. You don't even see the lantern.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Then if I pull it up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still lit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should put our head through it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so, too, but you've got to do it quick because it's going to stop real quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still a foot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it, do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But do it really fast!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not doing that, no way! You're crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's gone. It only lasts about a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could have been decapitated, doing that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he says it lasts a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's been about twice, a minute each time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each time it's lasted about a minute, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we've timed it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both times, it's been approximately the same length of time, close to a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keen Mind, nah, it's a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Figure out who's going to put their head in and help us see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we care what's in the-- oh, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you readied?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll grab onto her britches as she's doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm finally walking in because everybody has vanished off the ship, and no one is eating anything.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You're missing it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus, grab my feet, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just grab my feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I like grabbing feet. Here we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll get ready with Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hole opens up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's open! Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look inside; it's darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop me further!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Down to her feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still darkness. You can put your goggles on, if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goggles, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull back a bit and look, and there's a pile of objects there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab a few!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you pull her out before she slips.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yep, I'm on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pull me back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it does, the hole closes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! That's cool. Do that again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, what if it's a safe in another dimension?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you see? Could you see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at it. First off--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I look the same?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is my face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's pulling her tongue out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Start speaking in Latin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other thing is a bundle of this really heavy, warm, winter-coat velvet material. It's a deep crimson-red color with golden trim on it. As you unravel it, there's an embroidered symbol across the back of it. That's the symbol, right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we recognize it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not. You guys have never seen this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's definitely an H with a bow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it could be the tail of a whale or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, let me see this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're looking at it there. There's not much more to it than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's on the coat, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That watermark is part of the paper! It's not part of the actual symbol.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't believe, Matt! I don't believe it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The fourth wall lies!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the coat, it is boots, and the third thing was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a seam in the middle of it, like it's two pieces joined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there anything else in there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was super dark. I hit a barrier. It felt like it was a barrier of stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if this ball is somebody's treasury or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or if it's their pink haversack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I mean! They've been storing stuff in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a vault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) It's a vault!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to figure out what all this stuff is, first. I mean, just so it's not a pole and a pair of shitty boots.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, hold this. I give her the doohickus, and I say: I need 30 minutes. I gather up all this stuff, and I walk with it, very happily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow him and sit next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for the sake of brevity, the boots are not magical. They're just really warm boots. The cloak is not magical; it's just a very warm cloak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that symbol on the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This appears to be a set of travel gear for whoever once might have had this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also use an additional ten minutes to touch the coat and cast Comprehend Languages on this, see if it says anything.

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: It's a name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Halas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halas. H-A-L-A-S.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we have just robbed Halas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have any of us heard that name before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (disagreement) Mm-mm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know what language that name hails from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to have some roots in Zemnian, but it's a divergent element, so a name that hasn't been used in a long, long time. Kind of like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Archibald, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, like Melchor. Things that are old historical names. In fact, roll a history check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Old magic. Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slips from you. There's something. You're like, hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, when you hit that buffer, did it feel hard and solid, or was it soft and earthen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your face hit the cloak. You were like (impact) into this pile of soft, heavy material.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was cloak and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you find a portal into somebody's wardrobe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was cold in there. I don't know. He's saying that the staff heats his hands, and there was a cloak. Maybe wherever this haversack was from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple of ball bearings fall out of the cloak from what was dropped in there earlier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, cool!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I collect them back and put them in my bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, at least it's the same place each time, so if it does close off, we at least know how to find you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Why are you looking at me when you say that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not going in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're really good at finding stuff.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll go in! If you don't want to go, I'll go, or I'll go with you. Want to go together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into somebody's laundry bag?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like someone was raptured, and we're stealing their stuff. That's what it feels like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just roll with it, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a big swig and get ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When she was yelling on the other side of the portal, was there any sound that came between the two? Between the portal? Nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you have a minute. If you start to go too long, we're going to pull you up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or if you're ready to come back, tug twice on the rope.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I hold his hand, if he'll let me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her hand.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Her hand, sorry. I hold her hand, if she'll let me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. I squeeze it way too hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, are you ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, (click).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One by one, you guys jump in, one after the other, and you both tumble in and hit a floor.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Can we see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, you both have darkvision because gnomes. It's a cylindrical chamber. It feels almost like a natural rock interior.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Doors out, anything like that? Any exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's just a little pocket.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: What do we see, what stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two other ball bearings you left behind, and that's it. It looks like you've cleaned out what was in this pocket.

lines.name: SAM, DEBORAH
lines.text: Tug, tug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys emerge.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That was so much fun!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was crazy down there. The lights, the monsters!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was insane!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're so brave!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a parade of horrors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're full of shit, aren't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there was nothing down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it was nothing. But it's a lot of space, so if we wanted to store something for safekeeping, it's a good spot to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The area on the sphere where you've been pressing this button, you look and it's freed another area as well that can continue to be solved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a note, the previous function of the sphere, we can access? Or is it one function at a time as it changes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it looks right now, you need to shift it back to use a previous function. Each thing you slide unlocks the next use, but it closes off the previous one until you reverse it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which I am memorizing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to Fjord. You've told us about the Halas thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this perhaps something to do with Sir Cadigan and Port Damali stuff? Do you know a Cadigan? Would I recognize the name Hadigas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cadigan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Halas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Halas? You roll a history check, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To see if this is his old stash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's absolutely horrifying. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If they did teach it, you probably weren't paying attention that day at the Archive, unfortunately.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Would I know it in relation to Sir Cadigan, the person I took it from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a history check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Deborah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody, come on, three rollers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. None at all. You've never heard the name Halas before, anywhere in Port Damali or in any of your travels, especially in relation to Sir Cadigan.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I turn to everybody, and at first I go, (straining), nope. Sir Cadigan was a big old meanie, but I don't think he had anything to do with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you've mentioned Sir Cadigan being a big old meanie several times. What did he do? Did you witness something?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (straining) Can't remember. But I think I might be like this because of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Adorable?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (as Trixie) A little weird! (as Twiggy) Sorry. She talks sometimes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He made you socially awkward?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I remember it was really dark, and it was really long. I had nobody to talk to, so I made up all these people to talk to. Finally, when I got out, wow is it a big, beautiful world! I'm so glad I met you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were trapped somewhere?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were you in this ball?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't think so. It didn't look like where I was. All I know, it was that big old meanie Sir Cadigan who put me in there.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: What did he look like?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: He's twice my size. He's very skinny. He wore this big ring with a green gem on it. I remember because he used to stick his fingers through the bars to scare me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How'd you escape?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I was really tricksy because I would sit there, and I would think, and I would practice all of my tricks. I was able to get him to watch my trick. He thought that I ran down that way, but really I was hiding in the back. I snuck out, and I ran the other direction. I was able to run, run, run! I've been running ever since.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was in Port Damali?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sounds real familiar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you all take ten steps back, and we'll see what this next hinge does?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone want to help, or you going with your standard roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, investigation for it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigation, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That hole appears again. You're unable to get past that point. You're hitting a barrier, and you're clicking it forward. There's something about the puzzle that's escaping you. You feel like you're not quite-- you're on the cusp.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Can I help him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try it again.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Just try it again? Okay. Yeah, I'll try it again. I come up, and I say: I've been practicing. Let me try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, either you both can roll individually, or one of you can roll with advantage as you're helping the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would give me the advantage, probably.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I have a plus ten investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a plus ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm at plus eight. Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hand the sphere over, holding the places, Twiggy goes in and takes hold of it. Both of you together begin to try and rotate and figure it out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I squint my eyes, and I look at it real hard, and I roll a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point, both together, Twiggy finds this small, rotating piece on the very edge that turns and turns. As it does, another cylindrical sphere slowly emits from it, like you're rotating a pencil lead that pushes out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It takes three fingers to do it at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You twist it, and you push it in, and it actually pushes in about an inch and then clicks inside, recessed. As that happens, a top part opens up a little bit. Caleb, you take that and rotate it. As it clicks into place, you hear (rising tone, whoosh). Flash of green light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Green light's never good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they never come back.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And we never return.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that was a fun campaign, guys. It was a lot of fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (English accent) Don't touch it, Mum, it's evil!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many times did you mess with it? Like six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember that sphere?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's it do? What's it do? (explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're no longer on the ship.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see four pillars a little closer inside the chamber. Each banner is a different color. The ceiling's about 15 feet high and there are two corpses on the floor nearby. Both long-dead and mummified, their skin paper-thin and pulled against their bones, their faces twisted in horror. You see the light gray stone walls and where these banners are, there are two on the side parallel to each other and two on the other. There is a red, a green, a blue, and a black. Each of these banners has gold embroidery down the sides and a gold embroidered symbol in the middle. The same symbol as the cloak that you found.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Did the happy ball of fun tricks come with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Mage Armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All four symbols are the same on all four banners?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was Hala?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Halas.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Exits? Do we see any exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Pedestals, are there anything on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to be either decorative or load-bearing, but there is nothing about them that catches your eye. If you want to take a closer look, you can make an investigation check, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the ground dirt, gravel, or stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stone as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty solid and featureless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The two corpses, what can we ascertain about them? Are they wearing clothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are both wearing clothing.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Naked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nudists get trapped in here all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not much dust on them. Which means either it's fresh or not a lot of dust to have collected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no entrances or exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, none. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it smell like death in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a faint aura or a faint scent, but either these corpses do not emanate a lot of smell, or it has faded in time.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I send my Mage Hand out to move the blue banner aside to see if there is anything behind there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just to give you guys a visual representation--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to give us a visual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Definitely won't lead to anything.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: For the kids at home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) D&D!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check your Twitters and Giphys for the gifs that have already started pouring in. This seems legit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Placing yourselves where you would like to be in here, if you don't mind telling me where you'd like to be placed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not in the middle, Matthew!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to be by the corpses. I rolled a 19.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I used my Mage Hand, so I need to be here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I want to be by the corpses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was not a sick beat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it build.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was not a sick beat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One here and one here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not right next to each other. I pictured a lover's embrace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they look like violently ended, or do they look like people who fell asleep and never got up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their faces are twisted in a horrible expression of ghastly terror or pain, but you don't see any wounds. Did you roll a medicine check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't see any wounds or any gashes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They definitely got a look like they saw something wicked awful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their last moments were probably pretty terrifying. You moved aside the--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: With my Mage Hand, from far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blue one?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately as it opens up, the mouth lights up blue. Make a dexterity saving throw. And Caleb and Nott.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I also have evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Not good. Don't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I rolled a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, still half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Failure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch Caleb spin and take it straight to the chest as Nott ducks out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this still the same day? It is. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we have healed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you take 18 points of lightning damage. Twiggy, you take nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As Caleb flies backward, I'll summon the falchion and take a defensive stance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: My hair stands on end a little bit from the electricity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Also, make a concentration check.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: A concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Mage Hand; I believe Mage Hand is concentration.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's a cantrip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it lasts for a minute. I'm sorry, you don't need to. It maintains itself. That's my bad.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the burst that came from the blue make it all the way across the room to the green?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did. It went (crackle) across.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just detonated on the other tapestry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hit the tapestry and dissipated. The electrical energy didn't seem to impact or hurt anything.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The Mage Hand'll drop the cover back in front of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It covers the statue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a minute before we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do that again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have an idea! What if we put on the red cape and then it does something if the statue behind the red thing sees it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Halas' cape?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do we have it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the haversack, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it on, or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's hurt!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Twiggy just hurt him.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm so sorry!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just going to do a quick Cure Wounds.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Winning friends!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just one. Oh, that's good! Take 13 points of healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Danke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a second here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who wants to put on the red robe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's your ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should talk to the locals before we do anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are the locals?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, these fellows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dead guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Yeah, forgot you can do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I can't pick. Somebody else pick. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one closest to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, okay. That's level three, right? Yep, there we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anyone else adjusting their position, or are you staying where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make sure I'm not in line with any of the banners.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, ditto that shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The lightning came out of here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It went (crackling) through the chamber.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll go with Jester, on the other side of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do this, right back here.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Then I'll be here; I'll be next to that pillar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scoot me over somewhere, too, while you're up there, Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just near Fjord. Boom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caduceus, the one nearest to you, you're casting--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Speak With Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you sit there for a second holding your staff, your shield strapped over the arm, your hand goes down. You close your eyes and focus, and the corpse on the ground staring off, its eyes dull and the pupils smoky and gray, breathes in its chest, seems to inhale, and it holds the air there, awaiting your questions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry, friend. You have one more task to perform before we can let you rest. What killed you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The wailing creature."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wailing creature. What color was the curtain the wailing creature hid behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Onyx black."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know. How did you end up here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Thank you, Taliesin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We had found an object and toyed with it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just like us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did any of his friends get out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the name of that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Halas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does the name Halas mean to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's no help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four questions; you've got one more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did anyone escape?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know how to get out of here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No." That final bit of trapped air in the lung escapes and it falls to stillness once more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give him a little pop and seed him for later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're casting Decompose on him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nice trick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Well, that was a little helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a lot helpful! So we know blue, bad, black, bad--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Probably green and red bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, maybe one of them is a good! Maybe one of them's a way out of here!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should put on the robe. Did you put on the robe? I can help you put on the robe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm trying to put it on. Does it fit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're slender for a half-orc.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fucking fit, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can be fit and slender.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they're all bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey man, you let strength be the dump stat.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We could stand out of the way and my Mage Hand could open them all, if we felt like-- There could be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The wailing creature could--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, it wouldn't matter where we stood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he is in line with the wailing creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have an idea. I can make a magical hut that nothing can pass through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is an excellent way to try and figure out what the fuck's going on in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to begin to take the minute to cast Leomund's Tiny Hut in the center of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An observation deck.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: In the center of the room, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, the center.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like one of those bomb shelter walls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a ten-foot radius, and everyone is allowed to enter and exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A ten-foot radius would be a bit bigger than that, so that would be the ten-foot radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we all fit inside of it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely. But I have to stay in the center of it where it is safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But someone needs to step out of it in order to trigger the other--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, can I send Mage Hand through it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can stick your hand through the barrier and cast Mage Hand and pull back in, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everyone is moving into it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to stay, still, as much away from a line-up as we-- like, in front of the things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not a whole lot of space there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, it's just a thought, but if we have to open two of these that are facing each other at the same time so they destroy each other, we'll probably have to drop that down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is impervious to-- yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll get there. We can experiment because this is impervious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we already know what two of these are.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if you unleash the wailing creature and we have to deal with it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It cannot come in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about sound?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, hours. That is a good point, although I have a decent supply of honeycomb. We could knead it up and make earplugs for ourselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is really resourceful.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And I have gum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just as good or better. You are clever.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah! Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did her gum come from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's survival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's do some honeycomb, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the gum. I'm not proud.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I was told as a child not to put things in my ears, but I guess I'm doing this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to soften it up with my mouth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before and after, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder what's behind green.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: All right, I'll sneak over to that side so I can see it, and I'm going to put just my hand outside of the area of the hut.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't need that hand, you got another one.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It has vocal components. Do I need to lean my head out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't make this the second time I've taken a hand of yours.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But my new hand is so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. So?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: If there's a vocal component-- only I have to be able to hear it-- do I need to stick my head out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, it doesn't affect you in a volume or noise way.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay. So I whisper something and I move my hand and that silvery, spectral hand comes off, and it goes forward toward the green. I pull my own hand back and get back into the space, and I tell it to push the green flag aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to move over here, probably, to get into range. As you pull back the green tapestry--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to crouch, even in the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You crouch down? Okay. As you pull it back, you see a statue behind it that looks to be some horribly mutated humanoid creature. Its body is bulbous and covered in sores, its neck is swollen like a toad's, its mouth and jaw open with rows of teeth, all made of stone. As it pulls back, this gaseous green fume spews from its mouth that fills the chamber around it. About half the chamber begins to fill with this before it dissipates, but it does not cross the boundaries of the hut.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, shit.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Red?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sound; a beam; there's a screech; there's a gas.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, light, sound, gas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smell? Sound? Vision?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what goes next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing next?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Should I try it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the red! Maybe it's fire.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I move over to be in line with the red, and I stick my hand out, and it flies out, the spectral hand. I pull back into the safety, and it pushes aside the red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pulls aside the red. Behind it, you see emerge a wooden door of red-painted material and the similar symbol of Halas painted across the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Red doors are bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the way out!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Should the Mage Hand try to open it, you guys? I can send my hand to try and open it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are still safe in here. Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Captain Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Proceed.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sweet! I whisper, and I direct it a little bit. It comes down, and it grabs a knob? A handle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a handle there.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: A handle, and it's going to turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clicking) It's locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm. Ooh! Fjord, look in your pockets!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of the red robe! Look in the pockets of the red robe!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I call it back to me. I pull out of my purse a little set of tools on a ring, and I give it to the hand and whisper it off again to go see if it can pick the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand hovers across. Roll an ability check, adding your dexterity modifier and your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: My thieves' tools? That's a 29.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have to do shit. I'm just going to sit there, drinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a few minutes. This is an intricate lock. As you watch the hand finish with the third tool that is being held between the mystical pinkie, you hear a slight clink, like a spring snapped or moved. The front of the door here bursts into flame, burning out in the area. It burns solid for a good 30 seconds. Surrounded by flame, all of you are being lit by this. You're wincing from the heat you feel you should be feeling, but it's all being held at bay by the hut's boundaries. Eventually, the flames die out, the door, tapestry both untouched.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I pull the hand back to me, and I take my keys, ow! Back in my pouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're very hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I search the pockets of the red coat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feels a bit extreme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deep pockets!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no pockets on the robe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No pockets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That door is still closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a heavy cloak, if you will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So there's no way in or out, and every door is bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we haven't pulled the black curtain back yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was the wailing one. The guy said it was the wailing one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should see what it is, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have heard everything that happened outside of this bubble. If it is wailing at us, I don't know what that would entail for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That says that the door is trapped, not necessarily that the door is unopenable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's correct. Nott, you could at least give it a whirl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give what a whirl?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Picking that lock. We are in here for another seven hours and 40 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought you picked that lock. The red one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It triggered something, but you feel confident.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll send the hand back out to try the handle again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (click, door creaking) It opens up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to follow through.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sorry guys, I'm a little absent-minded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, there's a lot going on right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a way out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just go out, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to double-check these bodies for things before we go. If anyone wants to help me with an investigation check--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You want me to look? I'll go look!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You're going to help me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great! I'm getting day drunk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Missing. Somebody has completely rolled these corpses and picked them clean already.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Sorry, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems that they were robbed before they came in here. It's weird.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Or while they were in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's even crazier.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Is there a way to tell if they were robbed post-mortem or pre-mortem? I don't know! How do you tell that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is some Bones shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you glance around the areas. There's not much to really pull from that type of material. You don't see any heavy bruising like they were forcefully pulled from them while they were living, necessarily. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we do anything, I'm going to whisper to Jester: You know, I like Twiggy, but she picks all the locks, she does the Mage Hand thing, she does the Hideous Laughter thing, she paints.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She makes a duplicate of herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has a cute animal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she likes chocolate!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we being replaced? Is this some joke?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they don't need us any more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they brought her on purpose and they don't want us anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's kill her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When the moment is right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am placing Frumpkin outside of the bubble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He always sends Frumpkin in to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to go look in the next room.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But I love that cat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin goes up to the doorway and looks. It is a dark hallway, no light. Frumpkin sees a little bit of light, but it's above, like there seems to be an incline. It's above and to the right. It's not a straight, narrow hall. It seems a little oddly angled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I could throw some light out there, but I don't really want to announce our presence. What do you think we should do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Frumpkin hear anyone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He would have told me if he heard-- I can't hear you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we did just cause a giant lightning thing. I feel like our presence has been announced.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to light up my staff, at any rate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light source on the staff now emanates and the chamber is lit well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to really announce our presence if there's somebody out there. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (oohing)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Fancy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got to use that piece finally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to come with?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although we should probably have someone check ahead, just for traps.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Ooh! I'm sneaky sneaky! Unless you want to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have fun. Tell me how it goes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, Nott, y'all okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine, Fjord. Everything's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry about us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just turn on you that fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't-- I think-- We'll talk later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb says nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: In fact, Twiggy's not even really going to wait. She starts to chase the cat. She wants to go see the cat and pet the cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Twiggy leaves the radius and starts heading towards the far end of the room.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm going to sneakily do it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. What are the rest of you doing? You watch as Twiggy just leaves and starts heading towards the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, now we have to go. We can't let her die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should follow her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll follow Twiggy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to watch everyone safely go to the door and not get killed, and then drop the bubble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk behind Fjord and I cast Blessing of the Trickster when I touch your back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would stay there, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but we'll know it's there, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As everyone finds their way to the door safely, you feel the moment to leave the field--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, if I leave, it's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well then never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the hut vanishes. Spell's expended.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hightail it out of this fucking room!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was well used, my man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to place. As you're stepping into the chamber, I would say Nott and Fjord, you both get just a hint of vertigo. You glance and you take a step into the hallway and it's an incline. You look up and you can see the light. It's hard to make out, but you see a faint bit of light at the end of it, maybe a hundred or so feet ahead of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vertigo just from the shape of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like stepping into the room and having no real idea of where the walls and ceiling and floor are. It just looks like a black shape and you're feeling some walls, but they're a little rounded. It's a strange aspect to this hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the floor seem rounded, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the floor just seems like a steady incline.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We don't see light or anything at the end of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the end of the tunnel, but you can't make out what's on the other side. It's too far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make light? Is anyone? We need light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was making light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With your staff, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Caduceus steps in with the staff, the light seems to be crushed down to where you can see the faint bit of it there, but there's something about this hallway that's swallowing the light or at least compressing it to where it's not giving off much of a radius while you are standing in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's weird. Do we press ahead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No other way to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you see anything, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was going to ask. It's a forceful darkness and looking at Fjord get nauseous, does this remind me of any ghostly presence that I experienced before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily, but make a perception check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I recognize it as an obvious arcane effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning the end of this doorway, whatever's at the other end, is being tethered by something that's not really material space. You don't know what distance you're traveling between these two objects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I relay this to the group. We jumped dimensions to get here, and whatever is laying before is not a hallway. In a way it is, but not the traditional sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it might even be the way back out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It might be, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we turn around and look at the door that we came back through, are there any markings above the door or around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to roll Eyes of the Grave, too, just to see if anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you step into the hallway and look at the opposite end, the hallway is just flush with the exterior of it and seems to curve out into the rest of the hallway. It seems intentionally placed to match perfectly, but has a natural feel to its shape. It's weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said we can see the end of this passageway, but not what's beyond it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling Eyes of the Grave. Just for the hell of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Nothing comes up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Twiggy?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm happy to keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marching order, please?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll be in first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twiggy, 50 feet behind everyone else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's after Twiggy?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm skipping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go after Twiggy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Twiggy. Who's after Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go after Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go after Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be after Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be after Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb in the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always. Hey, we're sort of in size order!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Caleb! You know in haunted houses a lot of time they attack the person in the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm paying attention.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm skipping stealthily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Tiptoe through the tulips.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Like Bugs Bunny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's a really creepy song from, that's from Insidious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue along this hallway, walking. It takes you a moment to realize, but as you're moving forward, the light seems to turn. Like whatever this source is, the light shifts slightly. Like whatever source is there seems to have some sort of movement. As you're paying attention and the closer you get to it, you begin to see it's like a flickering of firelight, there's a flame-based light source within whatever this next area is, but it seems to be rotating. You begin to make out shapes, vaguely, of things within that room, but it's rotating as you walk. It takes a moment for you all to realize that this chamber, you're spiraling around it, but there's no change to your sense of gravity, but it a corkscrew movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that's freaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (vomiting) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a crafted den or study of some kind, but the angle you're at as you come to the end of it is a heavy steep angle. You see all these bookshelves and a desk across the chamber and there are candelabras in there, they're all this harsh angle, but they're not sliding, they're all held in place by something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By gravity!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and use Thaumaturgy through the door to see if I can affect the flame before we enter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cast Thaumaturgy, no effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's weird.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's in front?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not in there yet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The flames we see are between us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames you see are inside the chamber, and you haven't entered the chamber yet. The Thaumaturgy doesn't seem to--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But are they in the way of us entering the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was just curious if the magic would follow through, apparently not, or whatever is in there is not real. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see any movement outside the flames?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Jessie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, 11, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No movement beyond just the slow movement of flames.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any scripture or writing on the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the interior of the hallway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, to like enter this door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside the chamber, though, as you get close and peer within, this is definitely a study of some kind. There are bookshelves upon bookshelves that round different areas. You can see a desk on the far end with a chair there. You don't see anybody in it. Across from where this desk is, you get close and push and past Twiggy and Nott to look inside. This is a tall chamber, it's maybe 70 or 60 foot tall. Taller almost than it is wide. On the opposite end of the desk, above this large collection of bookshelves, there is a heavy stained glass window that's about 30 or 40 feet tall, and about 40 to 50 feet wide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any image in the stained glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no light source behind it. You can see the stained glass and that there are colors to it, but there's nothing behind, no daylight to really make it clear from this distance. You'd have to get closer.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do we see any other exits in this tower, this chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from where you're standing. But you guys still have not entered the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we do it stealthily?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're about to enter into someone's study.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to case Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everyone gets plus ten to their stealth check. I'd like everyone to roll a stealth check for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Overall, pretty good stealth scores. You feel pretty confident that as you one by one enter the chamber, bracing yourself to slide down with the curved floor, and you stumble and trip as you enter because, as soon as you step in, your whole perspective shifts and gravity is as it should be in that chamber. You all step in at an odd angle and have to catch yourself as you have to reorient yourself in an instant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like stepping off a moving sidewalk at the airport, but way worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a neat trick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many toys today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Raven and the Rook is a thing that I don't have any information about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They make badass notebooks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ring based.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, oh! (oohing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at all those books!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! There's a ladder, you guys!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We like ladders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love a good ladder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing into this chamber, this door is already open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! A door that works!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all step into the interior of this den of some kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not looking at your notes, I'm just looking through the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the fireplace? Is it straight across?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no fireplace, but there are candelabras throughout the chamber that give a light source that flickers throughout the interior. This is all bookcases, these are bookcases, these are bookcases, these are bookcases, this is a closed bookcase. There's a small desk here and a large desk here and the stained glass window stands up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those books look like you could remove them and play with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb passes out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nosebleed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try the candelabra again see if I can get those flames a little brighter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once you start, all of the flames flicker brighter causing deeper shadows across the chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll reel them back in. All right, that's good to know.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You say now we see a door and it's open?
