lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the door you came through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's no other doors in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. You guys entered from that side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look for a door. That's cocked. Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That wasn't cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks pretty solid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You say the stained glass window was on which wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This wall here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gotcha. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a ladder over there as well. Looks like these are all set aside for climbing and getting higher.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll climb up the ladder and get just under the stained glass window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see through the glass or at the glass or is it above me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only color you're able to make out is what the candlelight from the inside of the chamber is enabling you to see from the inside, from this side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to maybe throw some illumination up so we can see the window a bit better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you all step into the middle of the chamber to look at this stained glass window above you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should have checked for traps and stuff, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I was going to say, I was actually thinking about getting up. I would like that, that weird corner ladder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You place yourselves where you want to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You and your damn loft positions, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like a good loft position. Since I was a kid, my favorite thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As there's more light in the chamber, you can see now, above this desk there is a 12-foot-tall, six-foot-wide picture frame. In the picture frame, from the side angle, it has no image. As you step into the center, an image comes into shape. You see a tall, ten- to 12-foot-tall portrait of a man: thin, of light brown skin, long dark hair that tumbles past his shoulders, a very thinly-groomed chin beard that falls to a point three or four inches below-- it's a very succinct point-- wearing a red robe with gold trim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he have a ring on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes are a piercing amber-yellow color, and his lip curls ever so slightly into a knowing smile.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: He doesn't look like Sir Cadigan, does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's where I was going. What about a green ring, though? Does he have a green ring?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we see his feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's lap up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, describe him. Say him again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do all of it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A tall, thin man of light brown skin, with long, dark hair that tumbles past his shoulders, a very thinly-groomed chin beard that falls to a point about three inches below his chin, wearing a red robe with gold trim, with billowing sleeves that fold across his lap. His eyes are a piercing amber yellow. His lips curl ever so slightly into a knowing smile. There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's got lots of rings on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's got some intricate rings on his fingers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's wearing a red robe, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It looks almost the same coloration, the same deep red, the same gold trim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh look! I bet it's that guy! That's his robe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's thin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! Ah!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Guys, I really want to know what's in the closed cabinet. Can I go look?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would check for things, but.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Should I use my fancy hand again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think both of you should be taking a look around in this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that's happening, the stained glass window, now that you have light that's illuminating it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no backlight, so it's just the light that you have on it right there. It shows clusters of different colored circles and discs arranged in a strange, tethered pattern. You see different colored discs, different sizes and colorations, that are laid into this with fragments of dark blues and grays in between. They are all tethered by these silver threads and various tangled-- it looks like a crazed synesthesia equation, if you will. Anybody who's trained in arcana or history, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The worst roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This arrangement, you begin to make out, is a layout of the planes, the transitive planes of the Ethereal and the Astral between the realms. You see these clouds of gray and light blue that mingle and create a Venn diagram where everything overlaps on top of. They act as the threads that hold these things together and connect them in between. The inner planes showing the elemental chaos where the primordial elements were ordered into following the Founding of Exandria. You can see where the flaming sphere is placed here, and there is the water, and the wind, and the earth. That is the scattering of these inner planes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Is there a You Are Here sticker?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you both notice, two things are off about this. One, there's no Divine Gate shown here. In this whole layout, there is no reference. Most maps or sketches or historical designs of this type of a layout contains the Divine Gate because that was a major event that happened after the Calamity and separated all of the gods from the mortal planes.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: This is old.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Old, just like the device.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense this was designed before the Divine Gate was ever created. Number two, there is an additional shape. Smaller than the rest. A tiny, ruby-like circle that floats in the Astral Sea, that is not tethered to anything, and seems to not really fit within your understanding of the cosmos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A small ruby circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like the same color. Like the color of a ruby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A ruby in the Astral Sea?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it blink, shine, shimmer, move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just the same type of material as everything else. It's the glass the window's made out of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where is that amongst the planes, the little ruby amongst the sea? Is it in between two certain certain planes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything else seems to be tethered by these silver cords, almost, that puts in this large tapestry. And that is just floating between all the lines in the middle of the Astral Sea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Confused by its location, I'm gonna touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You touch it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You touch it, and all of you hear this loud, heavy shattering sound as the window shatters into a hundred different pieces, all of them stopping about three feet from the window and freezing in place. Fjord, standing before it in this void gets sucked into the darkness and the glass window closes behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! What did he touch?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you serious?!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: He touched the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no one technically was watching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The red bubble? This is some labyrinth shit, motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What just happened? Where did Fjord just go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Fjord! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does this keep happening to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I do stupid shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing? We'll get to you later.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We were on the way to the cabinet--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why does he got to describe it and make it sound so interesting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can you focus on the cabinet right now?!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Because maybe it'll tell us where he went!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, you're right. There might be information in there. Let's go look at the cabinet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We're going to the cabinet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will support you and help you and aid you, but judgmentally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run up where Fjord disappeared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was actually technically watching from downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys notice him vanish. There's no like, where did Fjord go? You heard the wall explode and him disappear and then it reset itself and closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one else touch it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, let's all just be very careful before we do anything.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I like his style!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know a lot of people are doing a lot of things, but eventually get to me, I'm going to start ransacking the desk for notes about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Caleb's heading over to the desk. As you're walking by, Caleb, there are books and books on these shelves, and you notice that all of the books have a brass binding around them, like a lock. Like a square shaped manacle that is affixed around it, and it looks like all of them are locked in some way. There might be ways to open it, but it looks like whoever left this alone did not intend for anyone to open it but them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That looks like an open book at the end of the room, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking for a way to help Fjord right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are over at the opposite end of this closed thing. This also has a brass bar that is bolted and affixed to the closed cabinet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Want to take it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unlock it? Yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You want me to do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I will aid you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, so I'm thieves' tooling on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so make an attempt with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to find an area underneath the bar where there's a button press or symbol, and you get one of the tools underneath, push it inside, and turn. As you do, the bar (click).

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: While Twiggy does this, she sticks her tongue out the side of her mouth and one eye closed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be unlocked.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's open it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We both take each one and open up the cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you open the inside of the cabinet, and it is empty.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I don't buy it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's feel around, wiggle around.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: We stick our hands in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling, groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, this is an attack on each of you. Oh, that's cocked. Okay, that is 23 against you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is 17 against you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Each of you suffer 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uncanny dodge.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, uncanny dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you take seven points of piercing damage, but you are both currently grappled as it is slammed on your arms in a very The Thing kind of way, like when the guy's chest opens and closes. Yeah, it's some John Carpenter. It closes on you and you see on each of the doors where the striations of the wood are, they split and you see these eyes peek through at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I immediately turn around and Invoke Duplicity down on the ground near them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, that Invoke Duplicity appears. Where do you want her to be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right next to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so you guys are both up here right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For Pete's-- Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need you guys to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about me, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to do it! 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, 25 to 20? 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Marishative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for Marishative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. 15 to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12. Whoa, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is going at the same time as the cabinet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Beau is going at the same time as the cabinet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love saying that. That's an actual phrase that exists. I'm so happy. Ten to five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five, but I rolled a natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you. Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a long sigh at the beginning of the round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twiggy, you're up first.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm up first. First, I would like to, if possible, try to extricate my hands from this. Is it possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. You have to use an action to try and escape with an ability check. You can choose either acrobatics or athletics.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Acrobatics! That is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 is enough! You manage to wedge your arm--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I put my foot up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and pull out, and, yeah, you manage to free yourself from its grasp.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool. Using my bonus action, I want to disengage from it and back up a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, easy enough. You manage to back up to there.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Nott, you're up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Same exact move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two peas in a pod over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to pull yourself free of it as well and back up to this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action disengage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And pull away, no worries.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I put up my arm and I go: Twinsies!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow! So much blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Beau and the cabinet go at the same time. Your dexterity is higher than the cabinet's so you go first. It's a cabinet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that's great. It's got four legs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Levitz pained! (spoken) What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look over and I go: They're fine, and I go upstairs with Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not going to whale on this cabinet, bro?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. I don't give a fuck right now about that cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the cabinet--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it moves? Now I care a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is full on, we're talking dark side of Beauty and the Beast here. Just making its way forward. It does notice it's an illusion. It just steps through it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a perceptive cabinet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It moves through and it's going to attempt to bite. It can bite whoever is adjacent in front of it. As you guys move back, it's going to try and open and try and swallow you up into it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to lean forward and pull you into the cabinet's mouth. Against you, Nott, that is-- Ooh, that's a 12. I don't think that hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll against that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just a hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. And against you, natural 18.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, yeah, you hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right, so you suffer--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Now, did that first uncanny dodge count as my reaction, or can I use it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've had your turn since, so you have your reaction back.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: So I can halve it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can. So it would be 16 points of piercing damage, which is reduced to eight; however, you are swallowed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, she's in it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're inside of it now. It scoops you up. It lowers down and slams the cabinet shut as it pulls back. Twiggy's legs are kicking there, and like Audrey 2, it just sucks her inside of the cabinet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll never stop loving you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, she's lived in a box for like a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's used to this! Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what I would do. I would think that there might be something in this man's desk, so I start looking for anything of use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The desk is a mimic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's that. You go, "Okay, that's that." On the desk itself, there's a large vial of ink, about that big. It's a heavy vial of ink with this big red quill placed next to it into a little cap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May be Taliesin's.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a death trap. This is a fucking death trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's made of porcelain and silk. It's crafted to look like a young woman in a very fine blue and black silk dress. The hair is long and silver, and the hair in particular is very realistic.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Too much detail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Voodoo doll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it when the DM describes something as too realistic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you find in the desk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so then what I do is think: All these things can kill me. I back away from the desk. I'm going to move as far as I can away from the dresser, along this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll put you there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm sorry, I meant--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's (counting) 30, which puts you there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exactly, so yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to turn around with my duplicate, and I'm going to cast Inflict Wounds on the cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that at 2nd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second level, so is that 4d10 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's 4d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll to hit first. You have to roll a d20 and then add your spell attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Side of a barn door, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, not hard to hit. It's a cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 definitely hits. Roll damage. Since your illusion is immaterial-- go ahead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would the cabinet have a French accent when it talked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Be our guest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hon hon hon, nom nom nom, I love me some gnome flesh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have been here for so long.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nom nom nom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to chew for a second in anger, but it looks hurt. It's not bloodied, but that was a hefty hit. Not bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she was doing that, I was like: I feel like I saw him look over here somewhere. So over here, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm paying attention to her and going (vague noise).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Jester's go? Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit it with Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got caught up in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to hit this guy with a Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame is a dexterity saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! It's not very fast, this cabinet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nah, I didn't think it would be. That's not bad; that's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage. You watch this burst of divine energy around it with this faint aqua glow to it as it burns around it. The area where it hits, you see the wood darken and splinter. Its boxlike shape is beginning to warp and twist a little bit as it's starting to give up a little bit of its instinctual form. Now it's looking hurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spit it out! Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twiggy. Top of your turn. First things first, it's digesting you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take, ooh, that's 15 points of acid damage. You are inside of it, still.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool. I'm inside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fava beans.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Because I have an ally within five feet, can I attack it from the inside using sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd allow it. There's few places as exposed and vulnerable as the inside of its mouth!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to hang out for a minute and attack it from the inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You are restrained, so it's disadvantage on the attack, but it is also the inside of its mouth, so try it out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Disadvantage is an 18 plus seven, so I think that's pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Deborah, can you be here every week?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's a nine from my initial hit, piercing. Then with my sneak attack, another four and six, so another ten. 19 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a combination of wood striation and weird liquid muscle that are pushing against you as it's digesting you. You jam upward where you imagine the head might be. As you do, you hear (groaning) from the inside. It begins shifting and quaking, and the muscles are beginning to spasm. It needs to make a constitution saving throw, which it fails and spits you out. You are prone on the ground adjacent it. But it does like, (throwing up).

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: What does the digestive juices look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a coating of semi-translucent film with a very faint green texture to it. But it mostly looks like spittle, a very thick spittle.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And I'm covered in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're covered in it. We're talking Ghostbusters slimer hit covered.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: As I'm lying on the ground, I wipe it off the front of my face and throw it on the ground and growl at the cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have movement.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I do have movement. As a bonus action, I can disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Half your movement to get prone, if you want to, unless you want to crawl.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I think I want to crawl. Am I halved if I crawl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But I'm halved if I stand up anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your call.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm going to crawl. I'm going to go back half, so 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get under the table if you want.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go 15 feet back under the table. I can't hide, but I'm going to get under there because it's not that smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leave this little trail on the ground as you get under the table.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, slug slime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Nott, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Jester's duplicate considered--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not count as an ally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't bonus action. I will move away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just manage to duck out of the way as it slams shut inches from your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll skitter behind near that candelabra and bonus action hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are going to attempt to hide over here or over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I was going over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this way. You manage to bonus action hide. All right, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 19 plus a million. So it's a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty stealthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 29, yeah. I think we still have Pass without Trace. 39.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty hidden. Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will attack from my hidden position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move back out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You actually I don't think have Pass without Trace because I Invoked Duplicity, but whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, yeah. It's fine; he's still hidden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is a 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have advantage on the attack since it did not see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here. (counting) That's 21, plus I'll use Fury of the Small. That's 28. I was going to use one of my explosive arrows, but I have three, and one of them doesn't work. So I don't know which one I drew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d6. On a one or a two, it's the defunct one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect! Well, regardless, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do I shoot on a cabinet? I'll wait till the doors are just a little open and try to thread the needle and jam it right through its mouth heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it vanishes into its mouth heart, the cabinet closes shut. The eyes go wide for a second, and you are waiting for the explosion like, (straining).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's filled with pepper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It goes (sneezing) and starts sneezing heavily. As it's sneezing, the wounds that it's taken are causing it to sneeze up its blood. It is leaving puddles on the ground, until eventually the eyes roll back and it falls on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That cabinet had a mother!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty gross, straight through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all maybe be a little more careful about the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what are we going to do about it, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm okay. Gnome power of two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a room filled with books, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not. I'm a goblin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to join the women up top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything I see on the top of these cabinets? There's all this space above, and I want to see if there's anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking up there, behind one of the cabinets, you see a small stack of books that haven't been categorized yet. They're still locked with the same bronze binder, but it looks like they were set aside, like somebody threw them up there to get to later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey-- oh god, everybody's-- Twiggy, can you grab that stack of books over there and throw them at Caleb? Or take a look at that.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You got it, friend! I run. I'm still covered in disgustingness, so I start wiping it off and shaking like a dog. It flies everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All over the place.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up here is where Caduceus is.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Up there, yeah. I'll scamper up next to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a look at these.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do you want me to take a look at it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's look at this lock, see if it seems trapped or something, or I don't know.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, I'll check it for a trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do not appear to be trapped, but they are definitely locked.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay. Thieves' tools?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These bronze clasps around their form. Is that for one book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One book. You try and get there, and the lock breaks. One of your tools snaps inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, wipe it on this. That's okay.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the second book and the third book.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, second book? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That book, the metal brace opens up, and the book is available to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, Caleb!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Caleb, we got books!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any sigils or writing anywhere on the frame of the window or in the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Balls. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're panicking a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to climb down the ladder and look for anything, not books right now, but are there any buttons or switches or anything out of place, anything besides decor and a library?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did anybody see what he was doing when he disappeared?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he was looking in this area. He was like, "Ah", and then I feel like I saw his head go over here. But then the bookshelf was in the way, so I couldn't see what he was reaching for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did anyone check this desk over here, next to the portrait?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what Caleb checked earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the far desk, behind the mimic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one's looked at that, necessarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go snoop around there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You are going to head to that desk there. Okay, make an investigation check, and perception check for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception or investigation? I'm looking for hidden switches, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I see. Then make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, you see, amongst all the books that are latched in, there's one big, beautiful, red leather book with sapphires embedded in it along the base. It's locked in, and it's placed ostentatiously in the center of the center bookcase right there. You don't catch any other hidden chambers, but that stands out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Probably not important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, checking the desk, it is locked. It is arcane locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can't pick it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look it. You're like, "This is not moving." You're not sure if it's trapped, necessarily. But glancing at it, you're like, "This is locked," and it's locked in a way where you're not entirely certain. You could try, but it's going to be a very hard lock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Total of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? It's not budging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Should we open the last book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have Knock or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the title of the first book that we opened, by the way?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, is there any markings on the one that we opened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not opening it, just looking at the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The title of this says Public Debate Records: Forum of Zeidel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yawn.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Third one? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one comes off. This one, no title appears. You see instead a burn mark appear on the front, like it's singed.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very interesting. Maybe, here, let's bring it down to the table, and we'll open it from a distance.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes. We'll bring it down and put it on the table. Shall my magic hand do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're watching them come over with these two books, and they put them on the table in the center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So burned book and--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It has a burned slash on it. Should I open it with my magic hand? Everybody stand back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course! We've got to find out what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn around and watch it happen.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It goes forward. We're all standing back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which book do you open?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The one with the burned slash on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As it opens up, the pages pull open and come to rest. Nothing happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a book. You can see there is a place on the inside where a name might have been placed, but that also has been burned off. You can see from the way it opened up there are a few pages torn out. It looks to be maybe a hundred or so pages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, Twiggy, would you both come here, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This book--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ruby one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Do you see anything that could hurt us by touching this? Do you make anything of this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will search for traps.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm going to help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's investigation.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: If I help him, can he have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. If you're helping him out, yeah. Roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to say. It's definitely a very pretty book. It's trying to get your attention by the way it's designed and placed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't look like it's dangerous. Looks safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're paying attention to this layout. They open up this book on the table, and you glance over at it. You look back, and you look back at the book. Those are spell equations.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the one on the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that they just opened on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The burned one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The burned one.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Has spell equations in it? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to get Fjord out of that window somehow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the book! At least take the book! Hey, I've got an idea. I don't know how much time we have, and yes, we've got to find Fjord--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll touch that book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Touch the one that's open? Okay. You touch it. It's a regular book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, do we have her Happy Fun Ball?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't come with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have your haversack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, Beau. Since Jester's helping you at this point, you can do it with advantage because you guys are both glancing at what to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a look at that other book really quickly as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19. Thank you, Gil. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skimming over it, you actually wait for a moment where Caduceus is walking and the light hits it. You can see a point on the glass where you can just make out the faint dimming of the reflection across the smooth surface: the fingerprint left by Fjord. In a very Sherlock Holmes moment, you see the one moment across the glass where it's not quite as shiny, and it's that single bit of red that's imbedded in the glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you see, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like something recent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I know what Fjord did. Hey, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can either one of you put light behind this stained glass?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can try. I'm going to try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Backlight it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to cast Light on the other side of the glass. On the glass, on the other side of the glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it has to be something you touch. So you can put it on the glass--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I can throw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Light as a cantrip is a touch spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a touch spell? Yeah, you are not wrong!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll get down so that you can get up and cast it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I can't put it on the other side of the glass because I can't touch the other side of the glass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will make four globules of light, and I will try to put two of them on our side and two on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the globs appear on the opposite end, they're snuffed out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I think we should touch it, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say. I have a feeling that's where Fjord is. I think he touched this thing, which... yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if breaking it is-- 12 plus straight add the intelligence? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The void, the vacuous darkness behind this, reminds you very closely to the hallway that you traveled in here on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's maybe the way out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our options right now are to pull the mysterious ruby book, to touch the glass, or to keep searching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of you little ones, please, would you use your magical hand to touch-- there's a jar in that drawer and there is a bottle of ink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want them both?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If they are safe to touch, but don't use your fingers.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll send my hand for the jar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get the ink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head over towards that other ladder really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can go ahead and cork the ink and take it with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To come up on the level where Beau is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there's that weird desk behind there. Have we looked in that desk that's behind the--?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes, I did. Nott went to look, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That smaller desk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, what was in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's got an arcane lock. Can you undo an arcane lock?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you dispel it or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try Dispel Magic. Why the fuck not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Dispel Magic on the desk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Double checking here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A conundrum. Right now Fjord's having coffee with Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Fjord) What's your name? (as Grog) What's your name?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Dispel Magic. There's a release of arcane energy across it-- sorry, the divine energy. You see the sparkles slowly fade as your concentration ends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give it a go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll try to pick it again, I guess.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll head up to the stained glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's not locked anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's not locked! Oh. We open it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a (rumbling). It's one of those roll tops that slides up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want one of those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thousand-year-old roll top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they all do that, I go: I'm going to see how Fjord's doing-- (thud)-- and hit the ruby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As this is happening, the glass shatters. You watch as both Beau and Jester get pulled in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry. Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It closes back behind them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My actions affect other people. Fuck.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Twiggy says: The time to be bold is now! I'll run up and touch the same spot she did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Twiggy! Don't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (glass shattering) Twiggy's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a fucking bunch of idiots we are! It's so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a look to see if there's anything in that desk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then there were three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your party is now gone. Who knows where. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grabbing the debate book and we're looking at that desk and then we're taking off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're looking in the desk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's empty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Completely?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do this! I made this mistake before. It could be alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. I give up. Let's go find everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys go back up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. This place is weird. I did grab the debate book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me. I'm staying with Caleb until the bitter end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You stay behind. Caduceus, same thing: shatters, pulls him in, and then closes and reforms itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is everything we ever wanted: a room full of books and it's just us. Should we just stay here for a while?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're all locked. All these books are locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could pick them all. I just need time.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (laughing) Take 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (stuttering) I walk to that shelf over there and are they free? Do the books come off the shelf even though they're locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These books, as you pull, they're stuck in the shelf. It seems like the mechanism has locked them into place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A mechanism! I can try. I'll try to unlock the mechanism.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Try a single time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is to unlock. This is your thieves' tools.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The book comes free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I put it in my bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It really adds to the unknown.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just do the two next to that one and then we'll go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they look good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they're very good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the two next to that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just do one more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not as good. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (strained) It's not moving. It's not budging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go to the third one. Ooh, that's better! 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one comes free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. We're going to go follow them and we're either going to die or get out of here. I hope we get out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But all these books-- you're sure you got all the spell books? We need the spell books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need them. Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to just see if there's any loose books on lower shelves that I can grab on my way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I climb up and I'm screaming at Nott: Let's go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any other books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's moving up there? There's a bunch of shelves: books on the bottom row, there's the center row with the big shiny book, there's the top row with the other books--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, this is torture to me! Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take two on the other shelf and let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and pull? They're in place. They're not loose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Doesn't work. Doesn't come free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You press the button?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't reach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take her finger and I push our fingers together on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (glass shattering) Closes behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: New campaign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Been fun, kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll move this out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could have done the ruby book!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I came to destroy your party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a red herring. That was a trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it could've been the spell book that answered all your problems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're falling forward. Gravity is pulling you this direction. Make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the back-left of you, there's another hallway that goes into darkness behind you. In front of you, the chamber continues on for about another 40 or so feet. There's a dead end. It curves to a dead end and there is a pedestal in shadow with an orb there set onto this pedestal. Before it sits more corpse fragments surrounding glittering coins and jewels-- lots of jewels and gems-- what little bit of low light in here is catching them. What little bit of light there is, it's just the dull blue light. You can look up and the portal that you fell through is this faint blue sparkling loop that is the only light source in here. The rest of it's through your darkvision. You can just see the faint flicker of it reflect and refract through these scattered gemstones amongst this pile and a curled mass of deep cerulean blue scales. You hear a heavy snort from under a large, rigid horn as a pair of pale blue eyes open and focus onto you, the body of the large creature remaining at rest while its folded wings twitch. Powerful, but surprisingly slender, this young blue dragon lifts its head to address you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just took a short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) I'm okay. I'm a fucking sailor; I'm okay. I miss Grog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to talk to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarling) "The smell of unfamiliar sneak thieves finds us. The way is shut to you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I seem to have stumbled somewhere where I am not welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That, you have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you would simply point towards the exit, I would be most obliged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's the fun in that? Why are you here, little morsel?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I be entirely honest with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have recently been putting my hands where they don't belong. This time it sent me to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And what have we learned?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably to look and not touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Tell me, what else have those grubby hands touched? I like to know the flavors to expect."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you know I do have a very salty variety myself. I'll summon the falchion in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear coins scatter as the impact sends bits of its loot across the stone floor and into the shadows around. "Ah. It's been a while since my food has played back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now listen, I don't want to disturb you any further. I'm just going to see myself out stage left over here. You have a nice day and enjoy your vast fortune. I'll start to walk towards that left tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As soon as you turn, you hear another (loud impact) as the other arm impacts. The ground shakes a little beneath you. Make a perception check with disadvantage because you're scared as shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd you get that impression? Natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't even focus. Your eyes blur for a moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, small tears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got the jake legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stands there and goes, "Halas has not returned in an age. You shall keep me entertained "for now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before you devour me like a tiny little shrimp, would you mind a small request in letting me know who that person was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am charismatic. (squealing) 23! Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The body itself is not incredibly massive. This is a younger dragon, but it's still a fucking dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool when there are six others, seven others. (panicked mumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It turns its head curiously towards you and breathes. As it does, you watch these crackling blue bolts between its teeth, arcing between the jaws. It opens up slightly, the tongue running itself over the front. "I don't know where he walks these days. It's been a while, but we have "an arrangement."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An arrangement, you and he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. I keep watch on some of his surroundings and he sends me food and gifts. One "day I'll be big enough to eat him and this will all be mine. But until then, I'm fine with the flattery."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does he send you these, I assume, incredible gifts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He leaves little pockets around the world."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to bring up a touchy subject, but I feel like your friend might be dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for a second to himself. "Time does move strangely chamber to chamber here. If he "is, well, I guess that makes me lord of the manor."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear another-- (footsteps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Manor? Are we in a house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More or less." (footsteps) "If you can call the hundred or so chambers here a house."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez. You know, I hate to leave you without a friend. I mean, if this guy's up and left you high and dry, maybe I could offer my services.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. Roll fucking high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Jester both come falling through, Bill and Ted style. Both of you guys make acrobatics checks for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was trying to draw that shit out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You three-point land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're good! 12!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You three-point land. (bones cracking) (screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have no idea how happy I am to see you. Dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This feels like a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn it around this way. Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, Jester landed there. Fjord-- sorry, Beau is prone there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I started to take a step to the left while facing the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the dragon is right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. The minute he rears up, I'm going to Invoke Duplicity again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let's roll initiative first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot happening here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled really shitty initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He rolled a two. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only those present?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, only those present. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN, DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six for Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why do warlocks only have two fucking spell slots right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To perceive anything in there, you have to make an action, but it's up to you. So your choice right now is focus on the dragon or explore your surroundings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to focus on the dragon because my friends are here and I'm going to cast Blink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Over there, we're going to throw the-- Is Blink concentration?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. So you cast Blink on yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with my bonus action, I will set Hexblade's Curse on that blue dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated Southern accent) Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you cast on yourself and turn around, releasing your hand towards it, the shadows from the nearby area cling to it like chunks of a venomous symbiote for a second. As they grind into the corners of where its body is, the curse takes effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn, so I think you get to roll, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Blink was my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but at the end of each of your turns--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I do. I roll. Yep. That is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord turns this way and vanishes. There's two of these darkened hallways. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Jester and I go: Fjord just fucking vanished again! And I go: I don't know how this works! I take out the red elemental gem that I've had for a very long time, and I... use it. I was going to say I smash it, but then I felt that might be deeply irresponsible because then it could just smash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can punch him with the gem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Punch the gem at him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Badminton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Red elemental gem. A fire elemental is summoned as if you cast the Conjure Elemental spell, and the gem's magic is lost. So as you throw it, it shatters. I don't have a fire elemental thing on me, so we'll use this for the time being. As you throw it, it breaks on the ground there. Suddenly, rising from the impact, the flames swirl and build up into a full-fledged fire elemental beneath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Fuck him up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As for the Conjure Elemental spell, let's see if it gets its action right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hope it listens to what you say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, well, I think it's one of those things where, if something bad happens, it turns on us.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I think it does. I think it's concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if I lose concentration, but I don't know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is concentration, so you're considered concentrating right now. It's friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for the elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. What do I-- that's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have stats for the elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. I did when I was a druid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. I'll find it right now for you, and I'll text it to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can also use D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, do that. Pull up the fire elemental there. Initiative, what's the number on there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Search. What's his initiative?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You rolled a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. What's his dex?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus his dex, so nine total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine. Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. That's your action. Your movement? You're still prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Half your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to back up towards this alcove a little bit, right behind me. Yep. I'm going to use my bonus action to take Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Okay. That ends your turn. The fire elemental's turn now. It goes. It is next in the initiative order.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I would like for it to get up to it and to do melee attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the dragon still on the ground, or is it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still on the ground. The mini has it flying up, but it hasn't risen yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, sorry. I'm going to do the multiattack, so two touch attacks. First one, that's okay. Wait, what am I? Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus that. Plus six for your touch attack, so 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It lights up this place for you big time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18 is the dragon's AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Does it catch fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight, and it does catch on fire. Then it's going to do another attack, which, I think it fails. It definitely fails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's the end of the fire elemental's turn. Is it going to stay there or going to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's going to stay there and be like: What's up, I'm a fire elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You are now concentrating on Spirit Guardians. It's a wisdom save for the dragon. Is it friendly? Oh, look at that. Thank you for pulling that out for me. Even better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire elemental. All the toys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're amazing. That's a wisdom saving throw, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a natural 17 plus one, so 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes half damage, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so do I roll damage right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. No, I think it's at the top of its turn, isn't it, that you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think manifest and then on the top of its turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I thought it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's both. Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait. An affected creature-- no, it's when it start its turn. You're right. We'll come back to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, to about there. I can't do anything for a bonus action right now, can I? I can't dodge or something as a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's an action, unfortunately. Only Beau gets to do that because she's a cool monk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that makes sense. Okay, then I'm going to chill out and say: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait! Oh, I backed up. That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon is going to turn this way as it moves around the fire elemental that struck it. First, it takes d6 damage, right, from being on fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes d10 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10 damage. Roll a d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. "Insolent creatures." (footsteps) Turns around on the fire elemental and releases this burst of electrical energy. This lightning bolt arcs from the front of its snout or channeled the horn through the fire elemental and towards Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spirit Guardians...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so you're too far away from it. So it doesn't take any damage. Patient Defense doesn't do anything. You have to make a dexterity saving throw, and the fire elemental does as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Dexterity saving throw. Okay. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. Roll for the fire elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use evasion, or does that matter right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Evasion happens-- oh yeah, so you take no damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take no damage. Evasion, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take no damage. Roll a dexterity saving throw for the fire elemental. You duck out of the way. It strikes the wall, the stone exploding from the impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fire elemental takes 55 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fifty-fucking-five?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the fuck out! That would kill us instantly if it hits us! At least, it would almost kill me instantly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would kill me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screaming) Oh, Matthew!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you do this to Deborah Ann Woll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry I touched the window!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Deborah Ann Woll has a plan! Get to where I fall in! I'm still in inter-dimensional space!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said 57 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 52 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 52 damage. No, I'm sorry, 55.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we can give it the rotten drug fruit that we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to then fly back around to get a better area. This is actually going to take up in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high is the ceiling in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling is 20 feet, so it gets to max at the very top. It's ten feet above anybody, so it's out of melee range unless somebody can get to the top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. This is bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boom! Ah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have evasion. That's the only reason I'm okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, that seems much higher than 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 20 feet. It's right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hovering above. Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mini looks like it's flying when it's not. Now it's flying. It's at the base level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm with you now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shrugs it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yes, it hits. I rolled a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 just misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, a natural 17 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 misses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames are burning around its body. It doesn't even pay attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get me the fuck out of here. We're level seven. Why did we do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Not bad. That's top of the round, so (approaching screams). Next up, I believe, was it Caduceus first?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Did you go first, and then I went after you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we went-- we may have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the same round.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Same round, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you roll initiative. First of all, acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two minutes later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got some books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you read some books.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: 14 for me, acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 14. You're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You both are fine, so you land. You actually fall past the dragon. (screams)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land on the ground like, "What?!" (wings flapping) There's a fire elemental burning over here on the side. It's absolute chaos. Both of you guys now roll initiative. See where you end up on the initiative order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Caduceus is up first.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: 13 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 13. So top of the round, Caduceus, you're up first. Fjord is nowhere to be seen. You can see this giant shadowy mark on the stone where electricity is dissipating and Beau looks like she just saw a ghost, maybe shit herself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, speak for yourself!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the look! I'm not saying you did, but you have the look. Jester is surrounded by sparkling unicorns and is just like, "Uh!" What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to cast Bane on this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that insane? I don't know if that's insane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throw is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a 16 Charisma. That may be insane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charisma. Plus three. That's a ten. It fails.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! That was a good gamble!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that now has Bane on it. Boop! All the circles!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means attacks and save rolls are now a d4 negative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a negative d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Negative d4 to all its attacks and saving throws. So you cast that, and then you have your movement and bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all bouncing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, nope, nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The monk's like, "Really?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are all my friends? Bullshit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Where has Fjord the cowboy gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I see them over there. I'm going to run towards that hallway full speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one, or this one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so (counting) 30.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're going to appear ten feet from where you were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten feet closer to the end of the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use all 30 feet of my movement to head toward the end to see what the fuck's down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush up to the very end, and you come upon a small alcove and a small crystal, a faint turquoise green-blue coloration to it. Similar to the flash that consumed the room when the sphere was being puzzled. There looks to be a groove running across and down the base of it, and across the floor, and you glance over and there's a groove running all the way down the hallway across the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to Fjord, he'll touch anything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) He will!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crystal is dull. It is dark and it is just there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I learn anything? I don't know what to do. I'll turn around and I'll fire two Eldritch Blasts at the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Roll for an attack twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope that'll fucking hit. That is a 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. Second one is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit! Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh great, that's 16 points of Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 12 points of Eldritch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you peer and run down the side, turning around and firing these bolts out, they light up the hallway as they arc past, blasting into the side of the scaled armor as they both hit. The blasts hit and take damage, but it's a dragon. It looks over, "I see you, morsel."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you don't! You do! Four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It flickers in and out, and you're still standing there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You added your curse damage on that, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You add your curse damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did. Yeah, the plus three to each time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Fjord. Beauregard, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw Fjord dart that way, and I heard screams coming from that way--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were manly screams!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Manly screams! I'm going to run this way past Jester and check out this hall. My speed is 45.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get there. You see this small alcove with a green-blue crystal that's resting there, and a groove that's running along the ground and across the wall and continues all the way down the length of the hall. You turn around and can see that both of them meet in the center, and then go in towards the platform in the middle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In towards the platform or the casket? What's with the casket situation? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was the raised pedestal you saw behind the dragon. You guys haven't even looked at that yet because you just saw a dragon and fucking ran.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Into the platform. I'm going to touch it! I'm going to touch the crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You touch the crystal. It's cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did anything happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: (shouting) Work!-- into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Energy! No? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a bonus action? I'm going to use my bonus action to cast another ki point to do Step of the Wind and dash back towards the pedestal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the pedestal. That's-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're underneath the dragon now, feeling the wind blowing down from the wings, scattering dust and bone pieces around. You're having to squint your eyes from the bit of debris that's being kicked up from its wings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I dart by Jester, I go: fucking crystals! And that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Beau vanish down and come back, "Fucking "crystals, right?"

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Now I heard it yell at whatever-- down this line-- I can't see that it's him, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance-- You have darkvision 60 feet, right?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I do have darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see him down there.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, I see Fjord down there. Is it conceivable that he's fairly distracted with this, and he's not paying that much attention to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's conceivable. You're a tiny little thing.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm a tiny little thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hasn't done anything yet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm so little. I'm going to attempt to hide from his sight. That hides me, so I use my bonus action to just get hidden a little bit. Is there anything I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you are next to a very bright fire elemental that is lighting up the area. You might have to creatively use the space. There are outcroppings--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Go to the outcropping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to move into another area to try and get--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: All right, I'm not adjacent to it because it's up, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, I'll back into that alcove and attempt to hide in the alcove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you are small.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I am tiny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See if you can try it. It's going to have a higher DC.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: 15? To hide? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may or may not be.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But I have a lot of presence, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mini Halas.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I stride forward. I go, in my raspiest, most male voice I say: Hey! You look bigger than the last time I saw you! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Halas) Have you put on weight?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You've grown!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm really bad at charisma, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, but it was so good!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: But I'm just playing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're playing it. You're owning it as you stroll forward, creepy extended fingers and billowing robe. The dragon is like: (winging flapping).

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
