lines.text: And just looks right back at Fjord. It's paying about as much attention to you as it did when you arrived. So you haven't angered it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I haven't angered it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it doesn't seem to be convinced, necessarily. Unfortunately. Dragons are pretty perceptive. Good call, though. That ends your turn? Fire elemental's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He multi-attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But can it fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. It can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's out of range, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (burning) There you go. Does it stay put or move anywhere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could hold an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can he move forward a little bit? Yeah, can he hold his attack in case he's in range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. He can ready his attack in case the dragon comes in range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. That ends its go. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: SAM, DEBORAH
lines.text: Come on, Jester!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disguise Self as Halas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just fill the chamber with Halases!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halas, Halas, Halas!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Traveler, please let this work. I'm going to cast Polymorph on the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw of 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he's got Bane or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you Polymorph the dragon into?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But at the same time, I'm going to go: (shouting) Catch him! Because somebody has to catch him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, just so you're aware-- roll an intelligence check for me real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. I'm really stupid, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want to goldfish it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha. It turns into this tiny crimson weasel. I don't have a mini for that, necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, do you have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, we'll go there. That'll work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Missile snare?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, would it be like missile snare? Right underneath it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls down ten feet.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, it's going to take damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's got too much?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, it's going to take damage, and then it might end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes one point of damage. It's still in its form, but the fire elemental is in range and is readying its attack, so fire elemental attacks it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shouldn't have readied an attack!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would you know?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: How would you know? It's so dramatic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one, yep, it hits with a 20, which is nine points of damage. Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the elemental slams the tiny weasel, the weasel reverts to the dragon form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he gets another attack. Oh no, wait, he can only hold one attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, not the player. Well, no, I'll let you guys do all of your attacks, but I'll let the enemies do it, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He hits with this one, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. That's the thing you have to consider with Polymorph. You have to decide if it's going to take damage if you're going to put it in a tiny form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't hear--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. That was an awesome maneuver.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I shouldn't have fucking held his attack.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: How would you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's all good. That finishes your go, Jester. It's now the dragon's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I want to back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to back up? This way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'll stay there. Am I within 15 feet of him if he's on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spiritual Guardians has faded because you cast Polymorph. So you're backing up this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. What a giant waste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got him in range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes fire damage at the top. Roll a d10 for the fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of fire damage. All right, I'm going to roll and see. Yeah, that's a six. It gets its lightning breath back. Infuriated by the fact that you just turned it into a tiny little weasel, it's going to turn this way and release another arc of lightning down. I need both Beauregard and Jester to make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can use evasion again, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, evasion's just an ability you have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I succeed. Fuck yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. That was a roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a natural 20! I wasn't even looking at it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I cast Hellish Rebuke as soon as it hits me. If I'm alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of rolling right now, Matthew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was 50-something last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 51 points of lightning damage. You succeeded, so it's halved. You take 25, and you succeeded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 25 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take none.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Hellish Rebuke, and I go: That hurt! In Infernal. Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you cast Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing comes out. The ice gathers around you and then rockets behind you. No effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around and look at the crystal, and the crystal is now glowing. The light that emanates from the blue-green crystal travels down and arcs through the hallway, hits the center, and gives a faint line towards this object across the way. Twiggy and Beau, you guys can see, as it hits the center, this very faint trickle of energy is now hitting this far pillar where the darkened sphere is standing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Twiggy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was cold damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was cold? That was awesome.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Fire on the other one? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes-- well, the dragon's going to try and fly up again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire and ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, that's good. You get an attack, and the fire gets an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you do. You and the fire elemental do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we got it in range. I'm sorry I killed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm sorry I just made a weasel and not a fucking cow or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I get an attack, and Sentinel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Miss. The fire elemental does get another attack as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon, however, does still manage to get out of melee range and get itself up in the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five, ten, plus another 13 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 damage? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? It's dice times two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. With the rest of its ten feet up it's going (counting). The dragon is now currently hovering over--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going after Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll say it's there. The dragon, seeing the glyphs light up, is now turning--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it its turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it just finished its turn blasting and uses its movement to move up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes fire damage, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. You get another ten fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. That finishes that round. Next round, top of it, we have-- no, because you guys came in last round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott and Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Caleb, you guys have a few more rounds. You dilly-dallied back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could stay here, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are looking through books right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, no, it's the elemental's turn, right? The elemental goes after the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The elemental went after Twiggy. It already went. It held its action, remember?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus. You're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I saw a bit of this go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You are no longer invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, I'm back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw none of this. You were over here in this chamber. All you saw was a blue thing go (buzzing). That's all you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lightning--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw lightning go down there. You heard a scream. You saw a blue glow (buzzing) up the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm down here now going (screaming).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just so I can hold if I need to. Yeah, there's no Caleb. I'm going to yell: Duck! And I'm going to ready a shot of Sacred Flame. Actually, Sacred Flame's not a bolt; it's an appearance. I'm going to hit Sacred Flame on the crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the one behind us. The one at the end of the-- behind Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You release Sacred Flame. The flame burns up around it, dissipates. No effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm, weird. All right. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It burned up around it and didn't do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, what do I do? Cast Armor of Agathys on myself and smash my head into the crystal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you want to try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's cold damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Do the football body slam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even casting the spell in its vicinity. Try casting it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All the moisture in the air gets pulled in and clings itself to the outside of Fjord as this icy, encased chunk of arcane armor that gives off this mist around his torso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I smash my head into the crystal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, is there any armor on your head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sure! It creates this banded partial helmet, and you crack into the crystal. The armor shatters off of you, and into the crystal. The crystal glows. You're a bit dazed by it, but the light tears down to the center of the chamber. The light actually brightens in the center, and there the central orb that's there that's been dark suddenly lights up with the same dull blue-green glow as the coloration on the floor and the coloration that you noticed very faintly coming from the inside of the orb when you initially were inspecting it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my movement now to run up towards the tunnel where Caduceus is in the direction that the light moved? If I roll less than an 11 on Blink, does the spell end or is it every turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every turn you have to keep doing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can end the spell prematurely if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, apparently I am fucking terrified. I shit my pants and I can't Blink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God! Why won't it happen? Okay, that ends Fjord's go. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run over here to the altar-casket situation and I'm going to quickly check it out. What do I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a large pillar with intricate carvings and you see runes along the side that are darkened. There is a sphere about that big that looks similar in size to the one the got you here, but it's not as intricate. It's more of a metal ball that has hollow runes carved in it that the glowing blue-green light is emanating from. It's lighting it from underneath the faint glow and it's lightning the middle of this small alcove.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was just your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and replicate on this sphere the movements I watched Twiggy do to get us here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You reach out and touch the sphere (whooshing), Beau's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hope it's home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Hope it's home."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. Twiggy, you're up.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fire elemental, right now, is no longer under Beau's control. The thread has been severed that was keeping it controlled as an elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's that whole thing about them which I kind of knew going into this. Sorry. Bye!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha's just like looking around the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, for the next hour, the elemental is considered an enemy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Twiggy? There's Jester currently now pinned in the back of this hallway by a dragon flying in the air. It's about ten feet above it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Am I adjacent to the fire elemental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I am. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are now within its melee range because you are now considered an enemy. It was originally whirling there and then all the sudden as Beau disappears it (growling).

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take out a stick of gum, I'm going to open it, I'm going to chew it a little bit, and I'm going to take it out and then I am going to pluck one of my eyelashes and put it inside the gum, and I'm going to keep chewing it and then I'm going to blow a bubble and the bubble is going to get bigger and bigger until it's bigger than me. When it pops, it covers my whole body and I disappear. So I go invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is my favorite descriptor of Invisibility I think I've ever heard in the history of my gaming experience.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It says "an eyelash encased in gum arabic."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That makes me so happy.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: All right, so I go invisible. That's my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do I need to use my bonus action to disengage or can I not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It still knows you're there. It will have disadvantage on an attack as you move from melee.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you could just use bonus action to disengage.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Or I could use my-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or just assume that it might miss, up to you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Assume it might miss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, assume 55 points'll miss.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm going to disengage from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fudge.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: 25 feet. (counting) Shit. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, take your time.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: What am I going to do? Okay, I'm going to-- I can use it-- oh, I already used my bonus action. Damn it, that's why I didn't want to do it. All right, I run to the pedestal, but I don't touch the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 25. You're right there.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, I'm right there. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your go. That brings us to the fire elemental's turn. The fire elemental does not know where you are. It's going to move to the closest target. It's actually going to, as part of its fire form--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the dragon the closest to it? I mean--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It would attack anything, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fire elemental is going to move through both of you. As it bursts through, you both burst into flames. So both of you are on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. It's half-dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. It is going to attempt to attack each of you once, since you're both within his attacking. Fjord, that is a 17 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 11 points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's reduced by-- Oh. How much--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The armor's gone. It was consumed by the crystal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes it simple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 19 to hit you, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19? Goddamn it. Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven points-- sorry, ten points of fire damage. That's going to end its turn. Jester, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points? 11 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points, and I'm on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Which means at the top of your turns, you take 1d10 fire damage, unless you use an action to put it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taking a cue from Fjord, I'm going to cast Blink on myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then if I try to run underneath the dragon--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a concentration check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- he's going to get an attack of opportunity on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's above you, it won't get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No? Okay, then I'm just going to dash underneath it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're not going to cast the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, by dash, I mean run. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30. You get there. Roll a d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a straight d20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I rolled a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still there. You get there and the magic just sputters for a second. Not going to save you, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then for my bonus action-- I get a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah-- Oh I can't. Oh! I'm going to use-- Nope. I've already used a spell. Fucking balls! I'm going to do nothing. I'm going to tremble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww. All right, end of Jester's turn. The dragon's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it takes d10 damage. I'm going to roll that. That's a nine. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it looking rough? Real rough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's bloodied. He's definitely bloodied.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pieces of his ribs showing through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's getting close to-- You're starting to see some wear and tear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. A single scale is chipped away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 68% guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not get his dragon's breath back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So instead, it's going to swoop down towards Jester, trying to prevent you from escaping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But look how cute she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's a 14 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Misses! It misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Minus a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in general.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As it strikes with its claw, you pull your shield up, sparks fly off as its claw arcs across the outside of your shield. It strikes with its other claw. Ooh, that's a natural 19 plus-- that's 28, minus one, 27.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure that's it. Yeah, so the claw strike manages. As the shield pulls away from the first hit, you're not able to get back quick enough and the second claw goes right across your torso for 15 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck yeah! Bane!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are looking at books still. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can unlock this one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Meanwhile...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I do anything about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can spend an action to do so. You take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. Six points of fire damage is fine. I'm going to book it towards that fucking altar. That's 30. I can spend an action to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get there, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But people are still fucking down, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you. You still have an action to use.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't leave a man behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- this is going to get weird. Halfway through my run, actually right before I start my run, I'm going to cast Meld into Stone.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Meld into Stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to Blues Traveler it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's not concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not concentration. Casting Meld into Stone so that when I end my turn, in theory, I will not be on fire any more because I'll be inside of the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flame goes out because there's no air for it to breathe. Do you step into it here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm actually just going to walk--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He Homer Simpsons into the stone wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go and I'm going to take my 30 feet straight towards the wall. I can't see anything, but I can move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your movement to leave the stone where you entered it, which ends the spell. You don't get to move through the stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk all the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a lie-and-wait type of spell. Like merge into it and stay there for up to eight hours, and then once you leave it. But the fire's out and you have your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would know how the spell-- I'm going to get as much movement as I can and then hold for the turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twiggy's invisible. Beau's gone. Caduceus is stone. This is going great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going great, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take 1d10 fire damage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you do. You take three points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, I'm sorry. Let's come this way, to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so (counting) 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (repeatedly) Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me take back half that movement and I'll go here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to-- I can't bail on Jester. I'm going to fire two Eldritch Blasts at the dragon, trying to get its attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 and a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points of Eldritch Blast. Ten. So 17 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. It gets hit twice. I'll say, go ahead and make an intimidation check. Just as part of this attack, since this was your intent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the dragon's attention. He was slashing into Jester, and after that, twice in the side of the head, it (growling) back towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have to roll blink if I don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose to end the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I think, doesn't it take an action or I can just choose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good question. Let's go ahead and check. It should tell you on the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says, "you can dismiss this spell as an action."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah. So no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you have to roll for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one fucking time I didn't want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are making some interesting calls tonight. It's exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twiggy, you're up.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay. I'm invisible, so I have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For an attack you do, yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: For an attack? Okay, so I realize it'll end my invisibility to do this, but I pop back out of my invisibility and I'm going to snipe one at him with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Is this with your bow?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: My shortbow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got a shortbow?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I got a shortbow. 18 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits, and it is sneak attack because he doesn't see you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: So great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear in that space and you let loose an arrow that sinks itself right into the heart and scaled underhide of the blue dragon.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I say: You're mean! That's ten on my initial hit, and then my sneak, seven and ten. So 17 additionally to the ten. So 27 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 points of damage. It's looking hurt. You can see blood emitting from some of its wounds.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: As a bonus action, I'm going to attempt to hide behind the pedestal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move behind the pedestal?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You believe that you are hidden.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I believe I'm hidden, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire elemental's turn. It goes this way. I'm going to go ahead and-- Jester. Roll a d6. On a one, two, three, it attacks you. On a four, five, six, it attacks the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eyy! Fuck up that dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, your turn. First, at the top of your turn you take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're burning. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so stupid because Cure Wounds isn't going to do enough to fix me to where if he hits me, I'm still going to go down!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do a higher level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is at the highest level!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all you could do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it. I'm going to cast Inflict Wounds at 3rd-level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going down fighting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, why is he doing that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural fucking one. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spin around. The flames are burning around you. You spin to look at the dragon and the fear wells up inside you, facing it down. Even with the flames burning around it, you can see its face coming through towards you, angry. Now that Fjord's vanished and is no longer in its sight, it's turned its attention back to you. You think you reach out for it and expend the spell, and you're just a few inches short.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm all alone. I'm going to try and blink, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're ending your turn there, you're not going to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if I move it's going to attack me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm hoping...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blink!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you come back, remember it's ten feet from where--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten feet from where I was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you invisible with Blink?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're in another plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twiggy is the only visible person.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm hiding, kind of? Really well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon's turn. Top of its turn, it does get its breath back. It rolled a six. It comes through the hallway angrily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. So I'll roll the attack for the elemental. Another natural 20! Holy shit. This is the luckiest damn elemental in the world. That's 12 plus three, another 15 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon also takes, because it's still on fire, an additional six points of damage. It's looking hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "It's looking hurt."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Evasion, but we'll do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You also still have this, I think.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right! You have the mote!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's another roll, if you need it.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Just a dexterity saving throw, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, I mean that's a 23. Sorry, yes, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stone breaks and splinters and the energy dissipates throughout the area. No damage. Rogues and evasion, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five little lit candles.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yep. Marshmallows toasting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks furious. (roaring) The breath itself-- it smells like burnt ozone.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I actually still look like Halas because it's not concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It thinks I'm a four-foot tall Halas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It went through the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really confused by it. That ends its turn. Top of the round.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're hoping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! We're going to land right on him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make acrobatics checks, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him. With your bodies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acrobatics check or save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's a 12. No, I was right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both fall prone right on the sides of it as you slam into the dragon-- onto the side-- (groaning)-- on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we cause some damage to the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for dragon scales, unfortunately, but you do both take five points of bludgeoning damage from the impact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like-- (groaning). Both roll initiative to see where you fall on the initiative order.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mmm, eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb! What's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't see anybody in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, there's nobody in there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in a chamber. You land there and you see this angry, burning dragon and this tiny little version of the mage that you walked through the den of and that's it. You see the glowing sphere here on the pedestal, these lines of energy that meet in the center. The fire elemental in the back way, burning. You're Troy in Community walking in with the pizzas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Minor question. Do I smell burnt ozone, since you said that just a second ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do smell the electrical remainder in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who saw me bamf out by touching the thing? Jes for sure did.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I saw it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Fjord? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy, I'm going to-- oh fuck, she's not there, is she?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Do they need to roll into initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They already rolled initiative.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, they already did. Okay, I didn't catch it. You rolled badly? Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to come out of the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see them. Hmm? Yeah, no, and I'm going to do the: We're running! It's bad! I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, that's amazing! (flapping) We're running, it's bad! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing Caduceus? You shout that as you're stepping out of the wall. "We're "running, it's bad."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walks out of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They didn't run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my action since there's no one to heal-- ah!

lines.name: DEBORAH, MARISHA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is really frustrating, and there's not a lot I can do. I am going to-- fuck, man, this is such a bad call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to cast-- so sorry, I'm doing this weirdly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast-- where is it? Goddamn it, where did it go? I'm going to cast Blindness on the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the saving throw on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a 16 constitution with a negative d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is Blindness concentration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wait, I can't do that actually, never mind. It's not, but I can't do it because I don't have any 3rd-level spells left. Oh, it's a 2nd-level! I'm a crazy person, yes. It's not a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a three plus four-- it's a plus four con save, so it's a 17 minus four from the Bane, so it's 13. Yeah, it's blind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you fucking crazy goth genius!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are blind for a minute. I'm going to take the rest of my movement and hop into the fucking orb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes you do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move up. The Bane fades.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Bane does fade.

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: The Blindness stays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Caduceus' turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pop back into existence ten feet. I want to stay out of his melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there. All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Caleb and Nott see that? Do we make a check of any kind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had to have seen Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I made sure you saw it. I was yelling at you and making a fuss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said, "We're running; it's bad," and then jumped into a sphere. That's some children's cartoon-level obvious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I'll use my extra language to go: Yeah, it's bad. Grab the sphere! I'll use my full movement to run towards the sphere. If it will put me in his melee-- will it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has reach with his bite. He has that entire hallway covered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use my bonus action Misty Step with the sword to (poof) over to the globe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yas, queen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will put you at 30, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will reach out and touch someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is out. At the top of your turn, because you're still on fire, you do take four points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-mm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's not okay. She's been abandoned by everyone who can help her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Fjord's turn. It's your turn.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I stand up again. I still look like little Halas, but as Twiggy, I reach in my pouch again and pull out the tongue of a snake. As I do that, I have in my palm a little bit of oil, and I run it back and forth on it. Then I throw it out this way, and as I do that, I say: Wait until we've left. I try Suggestion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw. I'm sure it's very wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw. No, that's cocked. It's a 19, unfortunately. Good try.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: The little snake tongue falls on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is trying to sniff for where you might be.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: For all intents and purposes, I'm already hidden; I don't need to hide again, if it's already blind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: In theory, yes, unless it's able to sense me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does not have tremorsense.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay! I still yell: Hey, guys--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does have blindsight to 30 feet, I just noticed.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's really good. That is a 25. But before I hide, I do yell: Touch the globe! Touch the sphere!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Halas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stay hidden?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I stay hidden over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you got it. You move into the back area.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yeah, exactly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Okay, that ends Twiggy's turn. Fire elemental!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a dummy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to-- Nott, roll a d6. On a one to three, it attacks you. On a four to six, it attacks the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. With advantage because you're on the ground. That is a 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they both hit. You take eight points of fire damage, and you're on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use Uncanny Dodge for, I guess, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take four points of fire damage. The second attack does nine points of fire damage to you. That ends the fire elemental's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lying on the ground, I will fire up at the dragon with my crossbow, trying to quickly load one of my explosive charges. He's within five feet of a friend, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's within five feet of all of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a sneak attack. Just letting you know, it's an explosive arrow, and you're adjacent to the creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yeah, I'm going for its head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, that's not great. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 just hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're prone, so you have disadvantage on attack rolls, by the way. So you do have to roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Well, can I stand up first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you stand up. That's half your movement there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18, plus whatever the explosion does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrow detonates from inside, creating a fiery explosion in a ten-foot radius around the creature that affects you, Caleb, and the fire elemental. The fire elemental is immune to fire; it takes no damage. The dragon, however-- will you roll 3d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it does not because it was hit by it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes an additional 11 points of fire damage. Then I need both Caleb and you to roll dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 11 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take none because of your evasion. You roll out of the way (dull explosion). Caleb's like, "Ah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. He's still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use half my movement to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You still have a bonus action and half your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use my bonus action to fire again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural fucking one!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. What does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to make an attack roll against yourself, don't you? For your weapon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how this works. If you roll a one-- I've never done this before-- on a d20 attack you must succeed in a dexterity saving throw-- which I don't, or suffer 1d6 piercing damage to myself. It's two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to fire a second round, you pull back and shoot and the mechanism misfires slightly and all of a sudden it scrapes you on the side of the cheek and you're like, "Ah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You still have your movement if you wanted to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, because it'll hit me. I mean, I guess it'll hit me anyway, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can still move within its melee if you wanted to try and re-maneuver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll walk around away from the fire guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go. The fire guy does get an attack against you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12. I don't think that hits you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just manage to avoid it. Okay. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck. I don't see Jester; she's not here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, she left already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see Twiggy. I heard her voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott is up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. A dragon that looks hurt, but not death's door.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: And a fire elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a fire elemental that is burning angrily.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the worst playroom ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Expeditious Retreat and since that is transmutation-- and I smell the ozone as soon as I hit the ground-- I am going to make my Transmuter's Stone make me resistant to lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to beeline for the sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, wait for--! Oh, okay. Bye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Jester's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get out, Jes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can be ten feet away. I can be ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet. That's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you can choose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean-- within ten feet, can I get away from the fire elemental at least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. He's placed in a way where-- I mean, you can. You can go-- oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I killed him, yay! Everything's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can go farther down the hall or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go there. That way, the fire elemental is not within range, and technically the dragon-- you're just out of the dragon's range, although you're going to pass it running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I wouldn't-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also take one point of fire damage at the top of the round because you're still on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good! Two ones and a two. That's great. So four plus four is eight points healed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Very valuable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got to run. Just run.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Dash and take it? Oh, you need a distraction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run and pray?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah. I'm going to run around as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I mean, there's no way to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around the edge of-- without getting hit, without me leaving his melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so (counting) 30, you can get to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then Blink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for your d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester remains. It's now the dragon's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's good. He's going to go ahead and take three attacks.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Is he blind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has blindsight within 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Yeah, we self-corrected already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's going to be...all right. Yeah, it's going to be a claw attack on each of you. A claw attack against Nott. That's going to be an eight plus nine, 17?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of slashing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I've gone since my last one, so I'll dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got that, okay. Against Jester, that is a natural four plus nine; that is a 13 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You deflect it, and it doesn't care much for Nott necessarily. You've been a threat; it's going to go after you, Jester. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, you watch two teeth shatter and fall to the ground in front, that moment of strength billowing up inside a pretty strong cleric. That's the end of the dragon's turn. Caduceus is done, Fjord is done, and Twiggy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twiggy, fucking kill this dragon or get us out of here! Do something!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mercy kill Jester!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mercy kill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the turn, this is the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are best friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the dragon looking at all rough or not really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looking pretty hurt. That's as much as I can tell you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm hidden well, so I have advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay. Arrow, snipe it with an arrow. I come out and I say: You leave my friends alone! and I shoot my arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why does Halas like us?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: 17 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage. With sneak attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so much cuter than I thought he was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's way shorter.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Seven on the hit and then with sneak, another seven's 14, another six is 20 on that. 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into its throat. You watch it reach up and with its claw scrape the arrow out of the throat and as it does you see a little bit of electricity arc out from the wound. It's looking pretty hurt.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay. I'm saying: Save yourselves! and I attempt to hide again. 19 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of your turn, you take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My heart rate is literally like I've been running two miles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His blindsight; he can see anything within 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within 30 feet, he can see through blindness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Nott's turn, not Jester's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, it's Nott's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will run towards the exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you disengaging?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You can as an action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Disengage!

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Or as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to run to the front; it makes an attack of opportunity against you. That's going to hit. That's a 15 plus nine, yeah, it's 24. It's going to be a bite attack against you, which does more damage. That's going to be 18 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm. I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The jaws bite into you and you feel it rake across your shoulder, but you manage to pull out, roll on the ground to back up and you manage to get your arm up and pull yourself onto the platform where the orb is still glowing that dull green color.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll turn around and fire my crossbow at the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not great. It's only a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bolt ricochets off of the hard scales of the dragon's hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I use my bonus action to fire again, I can't touch the thing, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the fuck out. You've done enough. You did enough! Don't do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can go now if he uses his reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester's next, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester's turn. At the beginning of your turn, you take fire damage. Six points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's only a ten. It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. He used his reaction, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans of relief)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragon's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a one?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got one hit point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Holy shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One hit point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had one after the 18?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon's going to wail on the elemental; it can't see anything else around it. Let's see if it gets the-- Does not get its--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please tell me the dragon can't touch the sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a hit, and a hit, and a miss on the jaws. That's seven damage for the elemental, if you want to keep track of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm, and 40 hp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, double sixes. That's 17 points of slashing damage to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The intro's been up one week. The animation takes a long time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon takes another six points from the fire. The dragon's hurt real bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's hurting real bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon's hurt real bad. That's going to end its turn, everyone else goes by-- Twiggy, you're up.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Am I, or is it the elemental who goes first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go before the elemental.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I go first? All right. I'm going to come out of hiding. I'm going to fire an arrow with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last man standing, Twiggy!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Natural 20! (screaming, cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage. We'll see if it's enough.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Nine plus four, for the hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, nine plus four, so 13.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Double the dice!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I doubled the dice for the hit, that was 2d6 before-- so that's for the hit-- but I get 8d6 on my sneak?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double that sneak attack damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can either just roll the sneak attack and then double the number, or roll twice as many dice, it's up to you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: That's nine. That's another ten is 19--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double that!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Double that to 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! Why aren't we there? We can't see them!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No one's going to see my moment of triumph!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one's going to believe her!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, nobody--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quiet, shh.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I step out and I put on my meanest face that I learned from Sir Cadigan, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still in the form?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Still as Halas, hundred percent as Halas-- and I say: This is for my only friends! Come straight forward, and I want to hit him in the heart because he broke my heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy breathing and steps) It stumbles forward towards you now that you're visible, its eyes blinking in and out, looking confused, still, with the shape, and goes--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Now I drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (low chuckling, impact) And falls to the ground and collapses, exhaling, bits of energy arc out of its snout and dissipate into the stone around there. The dragon is dead.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Cool. There's still a fire elemental, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup. (roaring flame)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fist fight.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Bonus action: is there a piece of tooth in reach? I'd like to take a tooth with me, a dragon tooth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but it's either that or touch the sphere.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm not crazy!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You said two fell on the ground, I thought--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did. They're scattered over in this corner. It'd be a move, grab it, and then go.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Okay, I'm gone. We're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (exhales)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the rules of drinking hard liquor on Twitch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am ready with stabilization magic for everybody. Everybody's going to be fine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many hit points did you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the end I had 13, but if he had hit me one more time--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would have been gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, you took that with 19 hit points?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To burn the reaction, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get the reaction, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She could have grabbed him, worst case scenario.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was Nott, the Bravest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was Nott, the Brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all, one by one, emerge, beaten, on fire--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Help put it out, for those who are still burning in flames, you find yourselves back in the hull of the ship. You see the crew, half of the crew is sitting there, looking intense, the sphere resting on the center of one of the tables off to the side, and as soon as the first of you emerge, they're like, (starts) "Where have you been?! What's going on?" Orly pushes forward and goes, "Where all you been hanging?" (whooshing) A few more appear. (impacts) Eventually, everyone makes their way out of the sphere.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You guys, I did it! I killed the dragon all by myself!

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the dragon was alive, we just left.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you really?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I really did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, Jessie...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, roll that shit, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn. Way to go, that's-- Did you get anything from him?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I really tried to take a tooth, but I figured it'd be better to live.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, aw man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I take it and I put it in my bag, and I go: This'll be good for later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go over to Jester and take the flower out of her head and be like: I think it worked. I'm going to take it back now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn and give Nott the biggest hug, just bury my head in her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius is like, "We've been waiting here for seven days."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! Are you serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're at Bisaft. Our repairs finished like a day ago and we haven't paid yet because you've "been fucking gone! The Dockmaster's not happy!"

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Is the Ball of Fun there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's sitting on a table. They've all been rallied around it, trying to figure out-- You guys vanished, and this was all that was left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't touch that. That's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We figured that was the case!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably safe to touch now, I mean, the dragon's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marius, do me a favor. Just tell us how much repairs cost and let's all settle in for the night. We're going to-- Still on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, it's about 130 gold for the masts, getting the various bits of the sails "repaired and fixed and everything."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I'll get them paid." Mark down that amount.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 130 gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twiggy, do you have that jar of beads?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I did take it. Right? I use my hand. I do have that jar of beads.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you attached to it?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, no, you can have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I pass the beads over to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk off.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: How you feeling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you stick around, I'm going to be helping every-- I'm doing a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Already gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. 23 points to everybody who's hanging around for a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a long day.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes, it has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's just call that lesson learned, yeah? Maybe we should all reconnoiter in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes mysterious spheres just happen to you, if I'm learning anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The good news is is that if Twiggy actually killed the dragon-- which you obviously did--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can go back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, maybe, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were lots of jewels on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it sounded bad when it came out.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Well, I just want to say that this was the most fun adventure I've ever had in my lives and you guys are the bestest friends that I've ever had, and I think you should keep the Ball of Fun, but I'd be very careful because Sir Cadigan's after it. I better keep moving, so I might get off here, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to stay with us?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: You guys have been the greatest friends ever, but I've spent my whole life in a box. I'm going to go exploring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand that.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was nice to meet you and nearly die next to you.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thanks for saving my life. (as Trixie) Yeah, thanks for that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As an honorary member of The Mighty Nein, just do us a favor and make sure you tell your story far and wide, yeah?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I shall. I shall speak of your bravery to all that I meet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lets pack some food and some tea and stuff before you go, you're going to need some--

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Oh, I've got chocolate!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go get some food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Twiggy. I'm sorry I found your cuteness alarming.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I have that effect on people. I put my hood up and two little Twiggys stand there and go Bye, bye!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would do that too, but I think I'm out of the ability.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'm all out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You stowing away, is that what's happening?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Yes, I go up to the gangplank, or whatever's attached to the dock, and I wave and say: Be good, be brave! Thanks for the adventure!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make good life choices!

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: I'll back up down the plank.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's leaving us, it's the best life choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her gnomish form vanish off the docks and mingle with the rest of the villagers of Bisaft.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that was the weirdest seven days I didn't know I had.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, are you all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, of course. I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a bad liar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) I'm a really good liar, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go to my room. (shuddering sigh) And go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I okay? Yes, I'm fine. Are you okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) Would you jump up here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you jump up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Onto you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will jump up onto Caleb and I will give him a big kiss on his nose, and I will whip out the last book I had. We still have books to go through!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll look at those tomorrow. Let's go get some sleep. I start walking off towards our quarters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like there's this trend of us feeling shitty after we come out of a fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I'd say something about that that doesn't kill you makes you stronger, but I feel pretty fucking weak right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a dragon. I don't even know what any of it meant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That little crazy Ball o' Fun is a troublemaker. Just like Twiggy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I guess there's still time to figure it all out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we just leave that particular function alone for a while and collect some gold to recoup our repair costs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like that gold was stealing from the dragon, just slowly but surely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Anyway... But he's dead now, so what does it matter? We could just slowly drain it. It's like a never-ending piggy bank.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if a big, blue finger comes through the hole, we'll know Twiggy lied.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go get rid of this concussion now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'm going to stay up. I don't feel like sleeping just yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, first mate, you got the con.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy that, captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm probably going to come out about halfway through your shift with a pot and two cups. Another day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weirdly, I think I'm great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oddly, I feel okay too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that wrong of me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like everyone else feels so terribly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, in the morning, we're going to comfort everybody. We're going to take care of them, we're going to feed them. It's going to be our job to feel good for them and bring them back around. They did good work, they just don't believe it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I oddly feel the most comfortable when things are a fraction away from going terribly wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something's happening. I don't know what, but something's happening. And you did good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So did you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Do better next time to keep everybody safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both quietly sit there, drinking your tea, finishing off the watch while the rest of your group sleeps soundly in their midday bunks, recovering from the strenuous activities of surviving three chambers of a hundred-chambered mage vault extraplanar home. We'll end it there and pick up on that next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done guys, holy shit! We have this ridiculous trend of guests killing bosses from the last campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the craziest thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Killing a dragon with a natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a fucking delight Twiggy was!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Twiggy forever!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You had some weird-ass spells up, right? You had some weird-ass shit that I didn't know about. I saw them, but I never really poked. You don't have to tell me what it was; did you have some weird shit that if I had prodded it would have been a thing?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, okay, let's just do that then.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: No, I'm very normal. I just do weird stuff with my normal stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Descriptive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for watching. Thank you again, Deborah, for joining. You were such a joy. Was there anything you want to talk about or plug before we leave?

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That set looks killer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks so good.

lines.name: DEBORAH
lines.text: It's so cool. Thank you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for playing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you next week. We love you, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
